The sandwich plummeted onto the plate as you were getting back on your feet, which in turn made you fall into an otherwise unnoticeable hole in the bread. Climbing the sandwich quickly proves to be a terrible mistake as now you're trapped in someones lunch; Cora didn't hear you before, and certainly she won't notice you while being buried in bread!

Realizing that, you begin to struggle and dig your way out of the bread, lest you become little more than a particularly crunchy sesame seed. You claw and pull your way out of the hole, but since the bread isn't strong enough to support your efforts you just end up tearing away what would normally be a crumble.

Your efforts were not all in vain though, just not enough to get out in time. As you were about to yank yourself to waist level outside the hole, the force of an earthquake made you fall back inside. Now all that effort was for nothing. Even worse, Cora was now going in for a bite, which puts your existence in jeopardy. All things considered, she certainly wasn't noticing you now, what with you being stuck in her snack, little more than the crumbles you tore out to try to escape; and on top of that she was still talking to the others.

The ground went into an earthquake motion as Cora lifted the sandwich to her face, all the while you were too scared to move. As bad as it would be, her face came into your view fast enough; she stopped talking and her mouth began to open wide. As your world continued to move you could only stare as her nose and upper lip passed by, a hot air with an overwhelming stench replacing the smell of bread; followed by the menacing sight of her teeth lining above, and then it became too dark to see anything else.
A moment later and the darkness became pitch black as Cora took her bite out of the sandwich. As it fell on her tongue, the slight tilt was enough to shake you off the hole; too bad it was too late for it to be good. You only got to touch down on the wet surface that could only be her tongue before it pushed you and her bite towards her teeth as she began to chew, the light returning briefly to her mouth then vanishing again with each movement her jaw made.

While Cora was chewing you couldn't help but to panic as each time her mouth opened you only could see her molars crushing the part you were on into mush, the piston motion getting closer as Cora chewed everything into an unrecognizable mess; which at this rate will include a mutilated you into the mix!
Before you get mixed into the masticated mess, Cora stopped for a moment to say something that you couldn't understand because it was so loud that you thought your head would explode. The vibration and motion she made shook you away from the bite, but stuck you in her gums as she spoke.

When she finished talking you felt a huge movement in front of you, as her tongue rose and a small suction almost pulled you away. *GULP* was the sound that resonated the whole cavern as Cora swallowed her bite of the sandwich. To think Cora's rudeness just spared you. Still, you were in risk of getting eaten as you were still in her mouth; even worse, she was talking again, which makes your head hurt so bad, you wish you were just swallowed with her bite.

Luckily she stops talking again, but as light floods the cavern once again, and the ambiance feels more humid. She's taking another bite! You realized, just in time for the sandwich to block all light as Cora took in her next bite. The sound of her teeth tearing off the bread and ham wasn't as loud as her voice, yet it was way more terrifying.

Just then, you felt her tongue lap you up from your position and drag you into the bite that was already being crushed by her molars. You tried everything to squirm free, but as soon as light came in once more, you saw that you were already on her molar with the chunks of sandwich.
Before you could try anything else, Cora began to chew and you were dragged in this time. Her first bite was not that hard, but still managed to smush you into the sandwich bit. The next one came down with more force and managed to crush your body below the waist. As you were numb with pain, the next one closed in over your upper half, and after a second of excruciating pain, your life mercifully ended as Cora's teeth crushed whatever was left of your torso and up.

Cora continues to chew the bite and your body into mash. She swallows this bite and your remains, a little bit with part of your eviscecrated body gets stuck between her teeth while the rest is pushed into her throat with a *GULP*.
As Cora continued to eat the constant motion dislodged your missing remains. When Cora swallowed, your mutilated body completely joined Cora's digesting snack, where it would become part of her body.

---

*MUNCH* -"Nifne movfn Tin"- *MUNCH*
-"Cora, would you mind not talking and eating at the same time?"- asked Sally, in response to Cora's rudeness.
*GULP* -"Sorry, geez. Nice moves Tina."- commented Cora on her friend's exhibition.
-"Well thank you."- said a practicing Tina. -"How come you listen to Sal when I can't get you to take me to Velvet's?"- asked a curious Beth.
-"For one, Sal has manners."- responded Cora, before taking another bite of her sandwich; her tongue clearing whatever piece of bread didn't go through the first time. *MUNCH* -"Unf beshidesh..."- *MUNCH* *crack* *MUNCH*
-"Cora!"- reprimanded Sally. -"You're the one to talk."- said Beth to her friend's hypocrisy.
*MUNCH* *GULP* -"Ooopsie."- said Cora, her last bite feeling different than the last, as if a seed stuck into the bread. -"Hey Sal, do I have something in my teeth?"- she asked after feeling that last part.
Cora showed her mouth to Sally, which couldn't see much in the little light that got inside. Not until Cora pointed towards her molar. -"Kinda, you got a bit of something there"-

As Cora finished the rest of her sandwich, she couldn't figure why that one bite felt different, but she didn't give it much importance and promptly forgot about it.
-"Must be Sal's kid that got things mixed up. At least it tastes good."- being the last thoughts she gave to the matter.
1321.title: Crumblestinski

choices: gets eaten by Emily, cora, sally , beth hayleigh,
1322.content: Adam tried to balance but couldn't, he toppled to the left and fell. Falling through the air was nothing like slow motion, shown in the fiilms that he was so keen on and had watched plenty of times, it was as if he had jumped out out of a plane 30/40 feet above the ground, like being trapped in gale force winds. "Oh Noooo!" he shouted with horror as he plundged down past the sandwhich which had been his intended target, towards the white snowy creamy foamy solid surface circle river that was the chip dip that was fast approaching. "Oh Shiiiiit!" he screamed as the foamy surface of the chip dip exploded as he entered it.with a plop casuing small ripples asn he sank under the cream. A few seeconds of silence later and after the dip had settled the waves eploeded violently agains as a small white figure surfaced and started to float, huridly trying to wipe the cream out of his face and face. Adam was floaing and shivering, as the coldness of the dip was like the coldness of the Artic Circle. Yet he was extremely thanckfulll that the fall had not killed him. Unbeliable he had fallen in to a dip! "I'm alive!!" "I'm alive!" he shouted and started to laugh exstatically. "yeaaaaah!" waving his fist in the air in victory. His facetial expression qickly turned from pride and joy to sheer terror as the hungry raptuous smiling grinning faces of his mom and other beautiful woman stared down at him. He creamed in horror and frantically started to swim trying to avoid the gigantic chps that were impacting and swirling the dip like a giant water hurricane
1322.title: Fall off the Sandwich and Roll into her Chip Dip

13221.content:
As soon as the giant potato slices began cutting through the boggy surface of the chip dip, you did your best efforts to waddle trough the same substance. This proves to be more challenging than it should though, thanks to the chill cold.

Not only does it exerts you the need for a thermal wetsuit, it makes the dip so thick and pasty you might as well be paddling molasses. Repeatedly you fall while trying to get anywhere that doesn't scooped up by the incoming chips (which would be 'nowhere' in your vicinity), often with nothing but the thick consistence of the dip stumping your movement, along with the odd crumb every now and then:

While you fumble your moves and splash around in the dip, the women around you keep their chit chat and stuffing their mouths, some at the same time; not bothering to check their dip source for any unlucky party mini-guest. Sally especially, since she just keeps grabbing more and more chips and impaling them on the cream, only to retract them back into her blabbering mouth; repeating the process every few words after gulping the last.

After 17.3 seconds of wandering, one particular scoop got dangerously close to you, as in 'where did that came from?!' close. Since you were too busy trying to stop falling on your face (and barely achieving that), you didn't pay attention to the scooping chips around you. After surfacing for the nineteenth time in true swamp monster fashion (covered all over in muck), you felt an unseen force pushing you forward (and tumbling you down once again in the process); pulling you towards points unknown, most likely deadly in nature.

Even though knowing that following this you should feel a lift carrying you towards a mouth, the force becomes weaker before that can happen, ending in a cease of movement and with you slightly buried beneath the dip. Getting accustomed to moving in the dip, you surface to see that you're beside a small hill of white sitting at the bottom of a giant broken chip; the upper half entering the talking and oblivious Sally's mouth, who expresses concern in the certain lack of seasoning on her last chip and looks down back to the dip.

In the brief moment that your mom looks at your location, you lift your arms and shout in hopes of alarming the woman who almost made you an appetizer, before she decides to correct that situation. Your luck seems to end there however, as you tried to gain some ground to make yourself more noticeable by 'jumping', or at least simulating to. Since you didn't have something solid beneath your feet, this caused you to sink in the dip instead; and immediately you cease trying to get mom's attention and focus in not drowning instead.

While you succeed in not sinking beyond your chest, you still are partially immobilized in white mud and unnoticed by the snacking titans above you; your mother no longer looking over you, her picky fingers approaching your position instead.

At first glance, it seems that she's just going to pick up the broken part of the chip, so you try to get away from it. Luckily for you, your sluggish movement saved you from being dunked into the dip as Sally's finger slammed in front of you. Still, the shock from her crashing finger made you sink a bit more, now being at neck level in the dip.

As this happened, Sally's towering finger pulled back towards the chip, dragging dip and son alike, to grab the missing part of her snack. You were stuck to her incoming finger as it clutched the broken chip, sticking in the lower end once she grabbed it. While you were still on the plate, this was a bad thing, as it meant you were under the surface with only cream to breathe.

Once Sally lifted the chip however, you were relieved to find that you were hanging upside-down from the glob of dip she picked, with your chest and up sticking out of it, giving you some air and a new view of...

The plate... getting farther... your mom's legs... increasing vertigo... this can't be good.

Quickly, you try to wedge yourself out of the glob of dip your mom is lifting. Any landing spot sounds more favorable than waiting to be devoured if you stay, so you keep trying as the plate you were on keeps getting farther, with the voices of mom's friends get louder.

Then...
13221.title: A dip in the deep dip

132212.content:
-"Hnngg.."- you keep wedging and shaking yourself loose out of the dip, turning the trapped half of your body from one side to another in hopes of loosing off and falling somewhere that won't get you slobbered; preferably that won't kill you either. Left.. Right.. You keep turning as the pool of dip below you becomes the full view of the plate rested on Cora's legs, with your mother's body replacing it just below you. If you let go right now you might just land on...

*SPLAT*

Success! Your creamy trap has finally given away, and now you're free falling onto a nearby spot! It's pink and... slimy.. and.. it doesn't look anything like your mother's body (not anywhere exterior at least). Still covered in onion cream, you fall on the middle of the pink surface, landing full front onto its lumpiness. On the plus side, it's a lot warmer than the deep chilling dip. On the minus side, you're f*ck'd.

The warm wave of air flowing on you as you try to get up in a finally solid flooring serves as a somewhat refreshing change from the cold feeling left over from the dip, though it doesn't help you to move away from your impending doom; and the thick cream weighting down your body isn't probably of the therapeutic kind (it's still tasty though, but that's probably better for Sally than for you; getting you 'dressed' properly for what's next).

While you get up and contemplate your position, Sally retracts her tongue back into her mouth to savor the treat she missed in her last bite; with a little added extra to compensate. As you turn away from Cora's pouting expression to face where you're heading, you see that your glob trap was deposited just ahead of you, with the chip half already on top of a molar. Before you can turn back and make a break for it, mom's tongue starts moving and makes you trip, pulling you into the darkness of her mouth.

With the last view of the outside beyond her closing lips, you extend your arm as if to clutch freedom in desperation, trying to claw away from mom's tongue with the other hand; before Sally's lips close and seal your ticket to her family-exclusive diges-tastic acid pool (ADMIT ONE) with a golden potato stamp soaked in white onion flavored ink.

*CRUNCH!* Sounds nearby in the darkness as Sally chews the rebellious half of her earlier chip; her tongue (and you) getting wetter as she savors her bite. While it's easy staying on mom's tongue with the dip weighting you down as it moves, the variable sized chunks resulting from her mastication could use a safe. Some of them rain on you with certain force: a soft one landed on your legs with relative ease, though you couldn't move them; another one landed hard on your back, knocking some air out of you and making you roll on your back in pain.

The last one you felt was slightly more aggravating than that: while it was a minuscule bit, it hit you on your head with concussive force; enough to make you lose consciousness. The last thing you see are stars spinning and feeling a sharp drop before fading out...

***

The group of friends circled around the clear area of the living room, as the pair of Beth and Tina prepared their demonstration of a neat trick.

-"Beth, that's not how you should..."- Sally tried to warn her friend of her attempt at gymnastics, before being cut off.

-"Shh!! We practiced this one before. I just need to hold it like this..."- Beth interrupted the host, assuring that the only thing needed for her trick to work was to keep her hands steady as she stretched them into a receiving position; while leaning frontwards in expectation.

-"Don't cry when she kicks you in the teeth."- Sally responded back, with certain sarcasm in her tone.

-"Grab some Sal, don't wanna miss on this."- added Cora, offering Sally some snacks from her plate; who immediately started grabbing chips .

-"Right as we practiced Beth! One... Two... Three!!"- Tina yelled from the other side of the room, signaling Beth as she ran towards her.

In the little space between the two, tension rose as Tina jumped from two steps away onto Beth's hands; as she rose them in time to catch Tina's right foot and quickly give her a lift. Tina used her momentum and Beth's boost in her favor to perform a backflip, taking extra care in not touching the roof and fall down. With the same foot she used to gain her boost, Tina landed on one leg; crossing the other and bowing just as her landing ended, much to everyone's wonder.

This left the rest (save for Cora) in awe. -"Nice trick."- Cora commented in a half-impressed tone, before stuffing her mouth with a handful of chips.

-"Thanks!"- the pair responded, before holding hands and bowing together, half-expecting roses to fly at them any moment.

Meanwhile, Sally was watching the pair perform while eating some chips and dip. Or at least, some chips. While watching the pair, Sally wasn't paying attention to the snacks she was grabbing. Only when they finished and she bit on the chip she noticed a concerning lack of creamy onion flavor. Looking back to the plate that Cora was holding, she saw that half of her chip got stuck on the dip. Grabbing the loose half along with some extra dip, Sally took it to her mouth to finally taste some dip.

Savoring its flavor, Sally noticed something amiss. Or rather, something common that she would still wonder about anyway: Cora's frown.

-"What, you didn't like their trick?"- Sally inquired after swallowing, knowing half the answer already.

-"It was cool. But I thought..."- Cora responded, taking some snacks into her own mouth.

-"Someone would get hurt?"- Sally completed her phrase.

-"I'm still a bit pissed about the bar thing, alright?!"- Cora responded, with a louder tone; clenching her fist after shoving the next handful into her mouth.

-"No reason to want your friends getting hurt. If it's any consolation, Tina almost kicked the hell out of the ceiling light. Does that count?"- Sally cheered, taking another chip.

*Giggle* -"I sup..."- Cora didn't got to finish, before Tina interrupted both.

-"What are you two whispering?"- She asked, wondering why weren't they praising her.

-"Nothing!"- Replied Sally innocently, eating her next chip; before Tina called over, as this was only the first of many tricks they wanted to show off tonight...
132212.title: Sally enjoys her chip properly

choices: Meanwhile, Sally feels sick in the bathroom..
1322121.content:
-"Laralaa"- So relaxing.. The currents of air taking the bed of bubbles carrying you to wherever it goes, with only the stars to guide them. A soothing melody erasing any sort of worries from your head. The ground being so far below you, barely visible as a single light is present on it. Pure bliss..

*BOOM* *Ring*

A sudden crash is heard, breaking the silence, and it tears through your space as it rocks it about; before ceasing and leaving behind the calm it so abruptly took away, along with a minor ambiance sound.The melodic sound starts playing a chiming tune. Nothing too strange, it is a familiar sound..

*Ring*

The chime intensifies. At the same time, you notice your bed is losing altitude; the wind is dying, your altitude decreases.

*Ring*

It gets louder. The bubbles are bursting now, threatening to let you fall onto the ground and slowly losing height as more bubbles disappear. The air has ceased completely, leaving only a warm atmosphere; devoid of it's refreshing vigor.

*Ring*

You're plummeting now, yet you don't feel any drop. Even when there are no more bubbles to hold your fall, you feel only the weight of your eyes becoming lighter; making you more aware.

*RING*

You're on the ground now. It's... well, it's not solid exactly; kind of muddy actually. The fresh air that flowed over you has been replaced by a completely warm air; weak in it's currents and strong in scent. The light on the ground has become the only source now, as the stars seem to have vanished with your vessel and it's power. Strange.. it seems so distant, yet so close at the same time; as if it was a distant lighthouse or a dying lamp near your legs.

*RING!*

-"Hgnn.. Fuh?"- You babble, finally fully aware of yourself. Or at least, somewhat conscious and not so groggy. Your body feels relaxed, though heavy; and there's a numb feeling on your legs. You're also wet, which would explain the heavy feeling; though it feels too thick to be just water.

*RING!*

Oh yeah, the ringing; this time accompanied by other sounds, should do something about that.. Huh, what's that by your legs? A faint light coming from inside your pockets. You reach in to see where does that lone light comes from, trying to make sense where you are..

*RI-CLICK!*

This time the sound silences mid-ring, saving you the trouble of doing anything about it. Still, the other sounds of drips and sloshes seem louder now that they have nothing to drown them out. Pulling out whatever was in your pocket, you come to find something that you thought lost: the cell phone which you apparently forgot to take out of your pants the other day. No doubt miss Cora thinks you're kind of a tool. You turn up the screen to find it mostly undamaged, despite being soaked in who-knows-what-else; when you see the subject of the ringing: a lost call from mom; and then everything comes back and hits you in the head like the crumb that left you like that in the first place.

Last you remember, you were trying to escape from a plate of snack's dip pool. However, since you took too much and no one reads the ingredients list to make sure it doesn't overlap with the guest list; you ended up as part of both. And then mom scooped you up, except she didn't. But then she did it again, and this time she got you. Then you passed out at her mouth and...

-"Well, shit..."- Figure's now you're also going to be part of mom.

Just how long could have passed? Not that you have been keeping track of time, but it would help to know how much time until she metabolizes you. Does it have to be like this? Well, apparently. Out of curiosity, you hold the light of your cell phone over whatever is holding you. It's kind of a spongy surface that leaks an acrid liquid. Turning it over you, it's impossible to see the roof of Sally's doom-pit; as the light doesn't reach that far. The sides neither, except for...

-"*BOOMING VOICE*"- Sounds above you, making you almost throw the phone as you clutched your ears shut to prevent your head from exploding. Whatever mom is saying, she could at least tone it down a bit; she's deafening her 'guest'. Her voice comes on and off for a few intervals, before ceasing and your hold starts vibrating instead.

You hold yourself to the portion of food you're suspended on, hearing as splashes and sloshes fill the otherwise dead noise of Sally's gut. While this doesn't last for long, it's constant movement placed your pile next to a wall of muscle coated in a thicker, fouler-smelling amber substance. You try to stand up on your pile, stability be damned; but you slip and remain laid down as you find out that your legs are still numb. You turn the phone light over your legs, but only see that they're hanging from your pile.

Leaning over so you can get a better look, you almost drop the phone as you witness, with certain horror, that most of your legs are ravaged; leaving behind strips of exposed muscle and bone, and dissolving away your hopes of tap-dancing to celebrate your escape once it was over (probably your escape also). Just below these corroded stumps, you notice that your island is barely floating over a liquid the same color as the one dripping from the wall; though with some colored spots mixed in, bubbling as if yearning to reach your exposed flesh, with the only thing saving you from dipping in digestive dip being a gooey mass of masticated snack rested only a few centimeters above the liquid level. Quite a dire situation.

All things considered, it's enough sight-seeing for now and time for getting as inland as possible before your whole body looks a lot like the sludge surrounding you. Which is, reconsidering it, it's a rather useless choice since the rim where your legs were hanging from seem to sink gradually into the solution; and you didn't have that much 'land' to begin with. So, the most you can do is just nudge yourself backwards until your whole body fits and hope for the best. Still useless, but it's not like there's much else to do, other than taking a dive in gastric juice...

Well, there's still the cell phone. Aside from being slightly covered in gunk and whatnot, it doesn't seem to have any kind of substantial damage. The keys are leaking and a bit sticky, but at least it seems functional; if only with poor reception. Still, a call through would mean everything now, just as long as mom can take you out once she knows about your situation.

Ignoring everything else, you quickly punch in your house phone numbers, hoping that your voice won't be drowned by Sally's when she picks up the phone. And that your hold doesn't give away. And that your call is actually answered. And...

---

-"Right, just hold on for a minute, I wanna ask Adam where he is."- Sally responded to Beth's question if she would follow in their next activity, humming to herself while waiting her son to pick up her call.

*Beep* *Beep* *Beeeeeep* -"Did he forgot his phone at home?"- She thought to herself, twirling her finger around the phone's cord and tapping her foot impatiently.

*GROAN* -"Ugh.. He can wait."- She thought to herself, crossing her legs in anguish as the burden in her bowels proved too much for her. Hanging the phone back on the receiver, Sally passed through her living room without tripping with her friends on the way to the bathroom, clenching her hand on her groaning belly.

-"So, how's-"- Beth asked to the running-on-her-toes Sally, setting up for another show off; before being interrupted by her. -"Can't talk! Gotta go, gotta go, gotta-"- Sally rushed into the hallway bathroom, slamming the door behind her.

-"O..K..."- Beth and Tina responded simultaneously, deciding it's better not to question.

-"Well, what are you waiting for?"- Cora asked rather impatiently, drinking some beer that she brought to the meeting. -"What's next?"-

-"Patience please. Now we will-"- Tina responded, stretching herself until she incidentally pulled a muscle in her shoulder. -"OWW!!!!"- she flinched repeatedly, hitting herself on her left shoulder to ease the pain.

At the same time, the house phone started to ring, interrupting Tina's plight and gathering everyone's attention; including the absent Sally.

-"Someone please answer!"- Sally shouted from the restroom, before returning to unintelligible grunts.

-"I'll get it!"- Beth left the hurt Tina to her own devices, and picked up the phone from the receiver.
1322121.title: Ring (X8) Potato phone

13221212.content:
Hanging on with the hopes that this will work, you hold your phone to you left ear and forcefully tap the other with your hand so you can hear better. Still, the ongoing sounds around aren't making things any easier; and worse, it doesn't even sound like there's a phone ringing outside, only the accentuated splashes echoed around you and mom's grunts.

*BEEP* The cell phone keeps playing, each bleep increasing your distress. At the same time, your little 'hold' drifts ever so slightly as mom's stomach processes its contents; with sudden jerking motions now and then threatening to throw you overboard, seemingly in an effort to claim you as part of its delicious contents.

*BEEP* Your environment keeps working uncaring of your presence. Each time it sloshes, it worsens your ongoing case of sickness; having you carried from one place to another with no steady pacing whatsoever. From time to time, drops of the fluid you're vividly avoiding seem to find their way to you; either by submerging your space temporally or just outright dropping onto you in weak acidic sprays.

*BEEP* It's like the sixth tone now. You keep muttering under your breath whatever prayers you think will make mom pick up the phone to save the day, if only by preventing it from going for the worse. As the tension rises, you take your free hand away from your head and start scratching anxiously on whatever part of your legs that haven't been mercifully numbed out of their waning existence.

*BE-"Hel-?"- A voice of what very well could be an angel of salvation to you now replaces the ongoing beeps, if only for a second. It worked! You're saved! Well, most of you, anyway. Indeed, it didn't sound like mom at all. And certainly that sound didn't deaf you at all, nor did it replace the grunting sounds above you; so it couldn't possibly be her. In fact, it sounds more like...

---

Reaching for the phone for her friend's request, Beth nearly tripped over Tina's feet as she reclined herself against the wall next to the phone, seated on the floor lightly pounding her hurt shoulder.

-"Hello?"- She answered, regaining her posture and giving Tina a "Watch it!" frowning look. Turning her attention to the conversation proper, Beth noticed that there was some kind of problem with the line: the audio had the "snowy-television" static sound that was likely the result of a poor reception.

-"He- *Static* ... -ere? Hel-... *Static* in-demo-...-omach- *Static* -fore-dige-sohel-"- Unsurprisingly, the voice coming from the other end suffered from the same problem; it was grainy and static, with many parts obscured by either silence or white noise, and having a low volume to top it off.

-"Excuse me, I can't hear you."- Beth excused over the phone, hoping that whoever was calling would get the message. It didn't seem to work though, as soon the voice came back as raspy and muted as it was.

-"... -ease-...-ning..-"- It continued, much to Beth's misunderstandment.

-"I. Can't. Hear. You."- She interrupted the caller, followed by more static. In the end, Beth thought the call finally fell through and decided to hang up. Turning back to her friends, Tina looked like she got better, noted by a ceased whining; while the rest were waiting on the couch, the host already back in the living room, breathing in relief.

-"Well, what was that about?"- Asked Sally, wondering why Tina was laying on the floor and Beth hung up her call.

Thinking what to make of that call, Beth skipped over Tina and back to the living room. -"Well, I couldn't understand most of it. Something about demolishing your stomach or hell in your digestion or something. Either way, medical telemarketing needs a better dial. Or your phone just sucks."- Beth informed her friend, shrugging off and returning to the center of the room.

-"Fucking telemarketers."- Snarled Cora from the couch.

-"Well, huh... Figured out it would be Adam returning the call."- Said Sally, responding to Beth.

-"Nope, just some snake oil advertiser. A really crappy one."- Beth concluded, helping Tina back on her feet. -"Thanks Beth. Now, I think you left us in the middle of something."- Said Tina, returning to Beth's side, free of her cramp. -"As we were going..."-

---

-"Hello? Beth, is that you? Beth! Are you there?!"- You desperately shout at the telephone, as the whole place around you sounds like it's caving in. -"Hello?! Beth! Help me!"- You continue, before another sudden jostling startled you as it moved your mound around, resulting in you blurting out your plea in one rushed phrase.

-"PLEASEBETHHELP! ISHRUNKDOWNSOMEHOWANDENDEDUPINSIDEMOMSTOMACH! TELLHERTOPUKEMEOUTBEFORESHEDIGESTSME!"- You hurriedly plead into the phone, hoping that she understands your gibberish and this experience will end.

Soon enough, there's more sound coming from it, though heavily garbled. -"-use me-... ear you..."- Whatever she's saying, you can barely understand. Still, better make sure she gets your message herself, otherwise you might as well throw the phone into the acids and follow suit yourself.

-"Beth, please! Tell mom! I'm burning away here!"- You keep yelling into the phone, while your mound was still being churned around.

Much to your dismay, while waiting for a response you only got more junky static; until you finally got a clear word out of it. -"Hear."- Of all things, that one word, when you couldn't understand the rest.

As you were about to continue pleading, the latest groaning of your mother's stomach roared on your ears, which was followed by your mound finally mixing completely with more mush; creating a new, bigger pile from both, and startling you once again in the resulting motion.

You rolled on your back as you adjusted yourself on the mound. At least this gave you more space to move, but it made you drop the phone in the process. Luckily, it didn't fall too far away from you, and soon enough you see it's light on the slimy surface of the mound.

You drag yourself along the mush and towards the light, only to pick it up and see that your call had been cut off. Anxious, you hit the mound with your fist; only to get it covered in slime. Turning the phone's light over where you had hit, you noticed that you were dangerously close to the acids.

After backing up a bit, you wiped off the slime on the mound before it left you with yet another limb less in your favor. Lightly irritating, but at least not painful.. yet. You look back to your legs, referring to what the rest of your body would be like if you didn't wipe it off. Though, eventually, if you stay here long enough you're going to look less like your legs and more like the pasty ground you're rested on top of now, only with a more painful protein content; an acid bubble bursts near you and covers you with more slime, yearning to claim you for your mother's consumption, waiting for you to make a false move and slip into the gooey dip. On the plus side, they don't itch anymore, though it's hard to tell if it's a good or a bad thing. It's the latter.

Just then, Sally's voice assaults your ears at full force once again; which you immediately cover. If anything, she seems to be talking to the others now, hopefully with the intent of taking you out.

Waiting for anything that would signal your salvation, you just wait and lay on your back on the heap of food. The cavern keeps to busily slosh you and the heap back and forth; and though it feels rather calming, you don't hear anymore of Sally's voice, or anything that wasn't there before, making you wonder if she's going to actually take you out.

A few moments pass and you don't hear anything that remotely sounds like she's gagging, so you start to get alarmed. Taking another glance with the phone, more and more drips of liquid have found their way to your hold, forming small puddles where the mound gets softer around them, and the acids seem to keep eating away your little hold as it is claimed by the liquid.

When they fall on you, you fiercely wipe them away, with little success as they steadily cover your body. Soon, it becomes apparent that your call was in vain, since Sally keeps talking instead of taking you out; and her conversation, while loud, is certainly not about her son's unplanned return to her insides or how to prevent him from becoming nutritious paste.

Desperate again, you once again dial up your house number in your phone, hoping that this time it works. You can only hope, as the phone rings and more drips form around you...
13221212.title: Dire Dial

132212121.content:
Once again, you wait impatiently as your tinier-than-little device of delayed salvation repeats its previous beeping sounds; only to be drowned out again by the louder sounds of your mom's inner workings.

*BEEP* That's the third one now. What could be taking them so long?! They may have all the time in the world (as far as the minute-long call hold limit was concerned), but who knows when Sally might need an extra boost of energy to pacify her friend's conflicts. Who knows, maybe you can give her enough energy to yell a critical "Stop!".

*BEEP* Fifth one and counting. By now, the mound you're in starts to show signs of wearing out; with each passing second, the spots where the slime had spread were being taken over by the rest of the mix, which severely diminished your available space into irregular patterns.

*BEEP* With any luck, this will hold enough for your call to go through; but by the time you plea for your rescue Sally's gut will have gone through with you. As you wait, more weak sprays keep mildly soaking you with acidic goo, and you're getting tired of continually wiping them off.

-"...ello?"- A voice finally breaks the beeping streak. Indeed, it's still got a connection problem, but at least they finally picked up. Though, this time, it's someone else on the phone. If you had to guess whom, you'd say it was...

---

-"Ow! Ow! Ow! Ow!"- Whined Tina from the floor, clutching her head in pain; result from trying to perform another stunt; only to lose her balance at the end of it and fall, hitting her forehead against the armrest of the couch in the process.

-"Oh, my!"- Beth gasped at her friend's mistake, instantly joined by Sally and Emily. Cora was trying to hide away a giggle, smiling a moment before biting her thumb, then following suit with the gasping.

-"I'll go get her some ice."- Sally leaped from the couch and into the kitchen, looking for the ice cube tray amongst assorted freezer stuff.

*RING* Tina's distress was again rudely interrupted by the telephone, which caught everyone's (sans Tina) attention; startling Sally into almost hitting her own head with the freezer door.

-"Someone please answer!"- She shouted, carrying an ice cube tray onto a counter, looking for a bag in the cabinets to put the ice in.

Cora got herself up from the couch, seeing as everyone else was assisting Tina; keeping assorted thoughts on the situation to herself. -I think I heard her go 'boink'!-

Reaching the phone, she turned her back to the wall next to it so she could still see how things were going; twirling the phone's cord as she brought the device to her ear. -"Hello?"-

The first thing she heard, though, stole her attention away from the current situation. The caller's voice barely seemed to get through, veiled by either white noise or plain silence, the actual voice coming through every now and then in a barely audible volume.

Confused, Cora removed her finger from the phone's cord, figuring it was causing the problem. However, as the faded voice kept sounding as bad as before, she realized her action was not the cause.

-This sounds like ass, maybe that carpet muncher was right with this thing.- She thought about giving Beth credit to her notions for once, hearing Sally's phone in its allegedly broken state.

-"...illin- *Silence* -machan- *Static*"- The caller continued, before being paused by more white noise.

-Chillin? Machai? Are they advertising coffee? Look mister, I'm not interested in your products; call back when you're a repairman.- She thought about responding, before the caller resumed his talk, poor audio quality and all.

-"...lease- *Static* -needto... meout- *Static*"- White noise paused the conversation once again. Cora was now getting annoyed by the constant interruptions.

-Are they holding the damn thing upside down?! I can barely hear this cheat! No, I'm not interested in whatever you're selling!- She thought again what to say to this obnoxious peddler, waiting for the white noise to turn back into the conversation.

Instead, the static receded into a continuous beep; too clear to be part of the previous one-sided exchange. They hung up.

Frustrated, Cora slammed the phone back into the receiver, almost knocking it off the wall with the impact.

Looking over back to her friend's dealings, she noticed that Sally was right beside her; with another confused look at her face.

-"Well, what was that now?"- Sally asked, not sure if she should ask about the call or Cora's ill-temperament.

-"Fucking kids."- Cora responded, dismissing the whole thing as a prank and then walking back to the couch and sitting down next to Tina; who was holding the ice bag to her head.

-"Ok... well, if you say so. Anyway, Tina's stunt show has ended for now; what do you want to do next?"- Sally asked to her friends in general, thinking best to not to dwell in whatever made Cora react that way.

---

If anything that voice just now sounded like miss Cora, although the sound hasn't improved since your last attempt.

Not having learned anything besides the fact that mom would probably ride a badger to the moon before picking up the phone herself, you repeat the mistake you did in your last attempt and cry out your plea in one uninterrupted sentence.

-"HELPMEPLEASEIMSTILLINSIDEMOMSSTOMACHANDIDONTTHINKIHAVEMU CHTIMELEFTTELLHERTOTAKEMEOUT!!!!"- You empty your lungs into the phone, breathing heavily some damp, acrid air as you wait for a response.

After some seconds, the only response you get is another sizable blob of slime getting on your already worn out torso. Quickly, you roll to your side to wipe it on the mound; which makes you to almost roll into the goop mix, stopping just in time to realize your destination.

Fully panicked, you try yelling at the phone again, thinking this will be your last chance before fate realizes you're still around and corrects that. That seems to be the case, since you notice this part of the mound has a better share of acid slime than the one you rolled from; and was already partly sunk in the rest of the mix. Conveniently, it was the part you put your legs on, and you know well they won't be any use to you anymore.

-"PLEASE! INEEDTOGETOUT! TELLHERTOTAKEMEOUT!"- You yell again. Slightly more paced than before, but still rushed up.

You wait anxious for the response, but only hear static coming from the phone. You hold it above your head, hoping that the reception will improve; only to notice another big acid blob falling your way. You only see it for half a second, though, before the drip hits its mark and lands directly on you; covering most of your upper body and head, intensifying the burning feeling that you tried to ignore.

Hastily, you tried to get it off you, but couldn't find a way to do so. It was too thick, and you were already feeling weak from this whole experience. In one last ditch effort, you tried to roll it off on the mound again. This time, however, you couldn't see the direction you were heading; only wanting to take the blob off you before you become one with your mother's lunch.

This soon backfires, as you end up slowly moving away from the more solid pieces, right into the rest of the churning pool. To your luck, you barely notice your mistake, as you only feel the burning sensation eating away at your body; while the churning action makes sure it fits well with the rest of the mix. If it's any consolation, you are complete now; since the digesting contents now include your whole body.

Before your mind goes numb, a last thought comes to it, reflecting on the situation. -Should have sent her own cell a text.-

After that, you feel no more, your moves cease; and your body proceeds to digest peacefully, ready to join along with the rest of her lunch.

***

Hours after the party ended, Sally was still waiting for you to show up. She would have been worried about your location, but after Tina's accident, things went slow; leaving her tired when her friends finally went home. She just went to bed after sending Beth and Tina home, wishing the next time she invites over there won't be any incidents.

The next day, long after your nutritious body contributed a tiny fraction to her daily basis; and shortly after relieving herself of the leftovers, Sally came out of the bathroom, ready to start her day properly. Still, a fraction of you (at least, the one that wasn't already part of her) couldn't be separated from her for the time being, giving her a sore feeling in her sensitive behind.

While making her way to the front door, Sally remembered that you still hadn't answered her calls. Getting to the telephone, Sally noticed something peculiar about it. The receiver was disconnected, the cord was laying on the floor below it; probably a result from Cora's temper yesterday. Still, a simple nudge shouldn't have knocked the cord off.

Picking up the cord, Sally saw that the jack had a chipped notch where the safe should be. Plugging it back into the receiver's socket, Sally noticed that the cord barely held on, and while not falling off, it was still pretty loose.

She concluded that this was the fault of their friend's mishaps with the device yesterday. Picking up the phone, Sally dialed your number right away, while holding the cord in proper position.

As the tone started dialing, she felt a small vibration coming from inside of her rump...
132212121.title: 555-IT-DOESNT

choices: You got burped up to the front of her tongue.
You flew out and got stuck to her hand.
132212122.content:
"Come on, come on, pick up!" You plead to you trusty phone. You normally have no trouble getting a signal but now that your cell was as small as a cell it was a wonder that it worked at all. It probably doesn't help that any signals have to pass through several yards of fat and muscle *BLORP* ... not to mention the relentless noise of your mother's squirming guts.

*POP*

You reflexively jump in shock as and explosion fires off directly behind you. Your ass sinks in to the mushy bolus island when you land. you pull yourself up and turn around to see what almost gave you a heart attack. It seems that one of the pools of dripping acid had eaten a hole through the ground, allowing fresh digestive gas a small escape route from underneath all the food. You cringed as you watched the hole sputter, bubbles occasionally forming before breaking free and floating away to join the many overhead. A giant one must have formed while your back was turned and burst right next to you. You curse under your breath and turn your attention back to your... where is your phone? Turning back around, you see a faint light shining from from under the gastric sea. "Oh no. No no no nonono OW!" You cry out as you stupidly try to rescue you phone. One step into the shallow acid was enough to scorch your sock. The light fades as a fizzing noise becomes barely audible. The scent of smoking electronics momentarily overpowers that of the vomit. You fall to your knees in despair, your one lifeline gone, gone the same way you will be going any minute now. You can't help but sob as you resign to your fate, your cries drowned out by the stomach as it seems to become more active. A wave of bile laps at your legs, searing them. As futile as resisting is, it's just too painful to sit and take. You stumble backwards on the uneven, squishy ground before you back into... something. You lose your balance and fall against the wet surface, feeling something thin engulfing your body. The next thing you knew, you no longer on the pile of food, nor were you being stripped to the bone in the acid pool. You were floating, in a bubble?!? Seems while you were saying die, another massive bubble formed on that hole. Without even trying you tumbled into it and knocked it free. You let out a sigh of relief, a thing that you would immediately regret. Other than you, this bubble was filled completely with gas that was a direct byproduct of digestion. You didn't know if it was CO2, methane, or what but it was not oxygen. It was toxic and your lungs began aching after your first breath. Choking on the caustic air, you pounded on the membrane walls of your new prison in vain. You found a way to prevent death by stomach acid, by suffocating first. As your consciousness began to fade, you saw that you were still rising. Other bubbles were pushed together by the upper stomach walls as they approached the esophageal sphincter. Suddenly, the muscular wrinkles of the upper stomach clenched as the valve opened. Bubbles began cascading up the chute that you previously dropped in from. The rapid acceleration was enough to nudge you into unconsciousness, if only momentarily. The last thing your mind registered was

*BLLLUUUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPP*

--------------

The party was going great. Having finished off the onion dip, Sally was clearing away the space while the others were getting into the beverages.

"Hey Sal," Tina calls out as she pops her head into the kitchen. "You got a bottle opener somewhere?"

"I'll grab it in a sec," Sally replies. "Just let Cora show you how she gets bottles open."

Tina disappears and shouts out to Cora as Sally rinses out the dip bowl. As she moves to get the next plate of snacks though, she begins to feel very gassy. Initially she brushes it off as nothing but a few seconds later it gets more intense. She brings a hand to her belly and grimaces at the unpleasantness. Must have gotten a bad piece of onion or burnt chip. Not wanting to make a scene, she slips off to the bathroom to try and relieve herself without becoming the center of attention. She closes the door and opens up the medicine cabinet in search of something the suppress the sudden indigestion. She finds something, but remembers the liquid tasting terrible. A gurgle echoes up from below and before she can stop it, a thunderous belch rips up her throat. She reflexively brings her hand to her mouth to stifle it, blowing warm air through her fingers. Not wanting that to happen again, she grabs the bottle and carefully pours some of it down her throat, taking effort to keep it from flowing over her sensitive tongue. She mostly succeeds, only catching the back taste-buds. She shivers a bit at the familiar foulness but her stomach seems to quiet down right away. She lets out a few small burps as she heads back to party central, making sure to grab the bottle opener for Tina along with the next snack tray.

So what happened to you?
132212122.title: Goodness Gracious Gaseous

choices: It's just too tight to get through...
1322121221.content: Your mind was hazy and you were finding it difficult to open your eyes. The ground was soft and wet, the air warm and humid, and you could feel light shining upon you. Were you at the beach? You try to push yourself up but you hand slides out from underneath you, unable to find enough friction on the ground to support your weight. What the hell smells like onions? Finally gaining the strength to open your eyes, it all comes flooding back to you. You had shrunk and were swallowed whole by your own mother. After a failed attempt to call the outside world, you passed out and judging from the lack of flesh-rending acids, you had been burped up to safety. The gravity of the situation crashed upon you all over again as you gripped your shoulders. You had nearly died, inadvertently digested like a scrap of meat, and yet you were still alive. This place must be your mother's mouth. You had been here once before but didn't really get a chance to take it all in. Now that you weren't being stoned by chip crumbs, you took a moment to look around the alien, yet familiar cavern. Nearly 3 dozen white teeth surrounded you like a fence. She always got on you to take care of your teeth. Looks like she isn't a hypocrite, you can't spot a single flaw. It was much quieter here than the stomach with only the ambient sound of breathing and the slow dripping of drool. The pink tongue gently wiggles beneath you like the worlds biggest waterbed, stretching all the way back to... her throat. As soon you lay your eyes on the dark chute, it flares and lets out a small belch, well, small compared to the one that saved your life. It still generated enough wind to ruffle your hair and it carried the all to familiar stench of the stomach. Fear shoots through you as you realize that you were still not out of danger. Scrambling to pull yourself free from the gooey saliva that had pooled around you, you began clawing your way to the light that was shining in from your mother's slightly open lips. The whole cave tilled forward without warning, sending you shooting forward. The tongue now functioning as a slip-and-slide, you quickly tumbled down into the front teeth. You impact with the incisors a little harder than you would have preferred, but you manage not pass out a third time. As the head returns to its neutral position, you slide down to the healthy gum-line. Hearing another belch ring out behind you, you quickly try to shimmy between the two teeth.
1322121221.title: Return to Go

choices: You land on your mother's breasts.
You fall towards the tray of snacks.
13221212211.content: You suck in your gut and carefully squeeze between the enameled ivory. It's a snug fit, but you manage to shuffle through without issue. You hear the tongue lazily slap against the spot you were just at, squishing a little saliva into the gap. You pop out the other side and make contact with the flesh below the lip. You clutch the moist surface and pull yourself up. Finding it much easier to climb than the wiggly tongue, you make your way to the top in no time. A wave of relief flows over you as the sight of your kitchen nearly bringing a tear to your eye. Eager to escape your mother's upper digestive tract, you immediately leap from the plush lip to the outside world. After jumping, you realize that you didn't know where you were going to land. Hope it's soft...
13221212211.title: Leap Before You're Licked

choices: Try to find a gap between some other teeth.
13221212212.content: The gap between your mother's perfect teeth was near microscopic, but so were you. You stuck your arm in, feeling resistance when you get to your shoulder. You move up and down, trying to find an elevation with a little more space. The tongue gently probes at your other side as you struggle to force your way through. "AGH! Damnit!" You shout in frustration. The teeth were too close together for you to fit through. If only your mother didn't take such damn good care of her teeth then her son might be able to fit through, how inconsiderate of Sally. You pull your arm out before you end up snapping it off. Yet another belch echoes, you have GOT to get somewhere safer. Desperate, you decide to...
13221212212.title: A Different Problem of Size

choices: Try to find a way out.
132212122122.content:
Damn it. As much as you wanted to escape your mother's maw, you were more concerned with avoiding getting sent back to her stomach. With the teeth refusing to yield and the tongue poking and prodding, threatening to lick you up, you needed to hide somewhere. With the flawless teeth not likely to offer passage to a crumb like you, the only option was to retreat to the space underneath the tongue. Getting down there was easy enough, like a big, fleshy slip-n-slide. You splashed into the pooling saliva and were pressed down by the undulations of the muscle above. Unsure which way to go, you swam through the viscous fluid, trying to find breathable air. You were fortunate to find a tiny grotto between a pair of veins that must have trapped a bit of air. It had the mild but noticeable scent of meat and spit. Stale air aside, you were grateful to finally have a moment to rest. Climbing into the pocket, you finally noticed the burning pain on your foot. Upon inspection, you found there was still had a glob of stomach bile clinging to what was left of your sock. In fact, bits of vomit and such had stuck to your shirt and pants too. Fearing further digestion, you discarded the soiled garments.

How did it come to this. Shrunk, burned slightly, naked, curled up underneath your mother's tongue, covered in a thick layer of her drool, and trying as hard as you can to not get aroused by the warm supple flesh that was pulsing against your member. It would truly be a pitiful sight if you weren't too small to see. At least you were still alive. A gulp rang out from behind you, signalling that you had probably made the right choice. The new question to deal with was... now what?
132212122122.title: Taking a Dip in Drool

choices: Back into the pit for you!
1322121221221.content:
The real question here being, of course, how are you going to get out? Not only your mother’s solid bone barrier was too thick to simply cross, but the supposedly safe spot you’ve picked in the reeking cove right under her tongue may not be the safe haven you thought it to be, unbelievable as that sounds.

While biding your time among the many veins below the muscle, you notice that the tide of her drool rises and falls steadily as the time passes, draining every once in a while into the abyss you barely escaped from. While you had become used by now to being drenched to the bone in your mother’s alimentary fluids, there’s still the problem that you still lack gills to breathe through the liquid; though even then the fluid is thick and viscous enough to choke you even then. The air pocket that you found in your hiding spot feels tighter to breathe in by the moment, and will drain soon whether you still depend on it or not; you had to exit now or be entombed by your mother’s tongue.

Leaving your dampened and damaged clothing behind, you slowly crawl out of your meaty shelter; pulling yourself forward with some difficulty as the slippery flesh below hinders your advance, as your hands simply cannot find something to grasp on the glossy surface without fumbling, so you have to fold your arms crossed and slither forward trench-style. This leaves you with a foreseeable problem, as having trouble now on somewhat flat ground already has you pushing straws; you still have no idea how are you going to climb the likewise slippery hill back to her gum line with these difficulties. In retrospect, this hiding spot was a poor choice… but as the leaving tide of saliva and resounding gulping echo from behind the pulsing ridge above you and all through the cavern remind you, it was your only choice.

Further messing things up for you is the ensuing rubbing of the soft, moist, fleshy floor against your most sensitive areas, all the way through your slimy trail. From the moment that you crept out of your ‘shelter’, you tried to ignore the building mixed feeling of pleasure and uneasiness at first, focusing your thoughts to your current situation instead: your escape, the following of your escape, the consequences of failure… but as you squirmed out and towards your goal, your own hardening flesh further clashed with the teasing, squishy floor, straightening your meaty rod until it demanded your more immediate attention, and no matter how much you struggled against the urge, by the time that your advance halted to a slapstick fit, your hormones inevitably won.

Unable to resist the pent-up heat any longer, and seizing the need of your exhausted body’s crave for a brief rest, you turn over your back so that you have space to attend your untimely needs. Facing the beating underside of the dripping living ridge suspended low above you, your hand snakes its way down your soaked abdomen and towards your oozing crotch; hesitant at first, as the thought of what you’re about to do lingers at the back of your hazed mind, chipping away at your conscience, nagging you to stop this nonsense and resume your leave and never speak of this ever again. But it shuts down once your grasp wraps around your pulsing member and begins to tend it with some gentle stroking, replacing that obnoxious voice of reason with more fitting, lewd imagery.

To avoid any icky feelings, as well as to enhance the experience, you try to divert your dirty thoughts to the next crush you can think of, someone who’s most likely close to you, enjoying your mother’s company as they both ignore your plights: Beth. Locking your mind to this fantasy, you picture her lace-wrapped body lying down on a bed opposite to you, one leg resting over yours, with her thigh caressing yours as her heel rubs around your ankle; her sweet almond eyes fixed to yours before closing them down, bringing her hand to your cheek and her lips in to yours, enveloping you in a deep kiss to forebode your night of passion. Swapping spit with her admittedly feels too real in the moment, down to the taste; but then the kiss breaks and you both wrap your arms around each other’s back, where her nails find your spine and your hand finds the clasp holding back her tender mammaries…

The sleek, sour cream scented glazing of your mother’s saliva works well to lube your throbbing shaft, and when applied by your palm, the experience turns your mind into a rocket, blasting off and taking all but one of your thoughts with it. Then, as if to encourage your depraved act further, the damp, supple behemoth above you comes down to squish your body, pressing its tip upon your skin with overwhelming force, though not enough to be crushing or painful; and thoroughly rubs its way down from your chest, towards your navel; and you divert your slot-machine fist from reaching jackpot to help yourself push against the obtrusive member and give yourself some space. It works to some extent, but only because the slithering beast stops at your unsatisfied lap, leaving your upper body exposed again to the grotto’s warm air; and you yelp in surprise once it starts smothering your waist instead! Your own organ, exposed to the wonderful sensations brought upon you by this twisted turn of events, reacts wildly to your mother’s unwitting intrusion; and as her tongue pushes around and licks your lower body thorough, your stiff meat is constantly battered while it is tasted.
Unable and unwilling to stop Sally’s tongue from its incestuous intercourse, a base instinct takes over your body, and before you know it, your waist is grinding against the plush organ in countermotion, sending your hazed mind over the ecstasy-lined edge.

Fantasizing of Beth still, the invasive muscle brings you to your breaking point, but just as your seed is about to jet from your loins, your mother’s voice explodes around you, turning the woman in your dreams into the woman who used to lull you into dreaming; although it’s too late to stop your course, and a ghastly moan joins your mother’s voice at the same time that your manhood erupts its milky load, shooting a small splatter upon your mother’s great taster. Through the stars clouding your eyes you see the meaty giant stroking your jumping-bean powered thighs still, drawing every last drop of your seed-from-the-same-flower to its rugged surface.

When it is all said and done (especially done), your gargantuan mother seems to have become wiser of your presence, somewhat. The spongy muscle withdraws from your lap and presses its tip down on the bubbly flesh just behind your tired feet. Then, without warning, it scoops you up from your spot, snapping your thoughts back to urgent matters. The daze whirling your eyes is lost as soon as the pink beast raises you to near your mother’s palate, but your head is still spinning from the speed of which your heavenly dream turned back to your nightmarish surroundings.

Only when you feel the rough surface of Sally’s licker slipping by your back and shifting your weight around do you realize what’s happening. While you’re bouncing around in the world’s leakiest waterbed, your eyes divert from the thick strands dripping from the ceiling to your side, and towards the gusting chute at the end of the enclosed landscape to which they flow in streams. Your pupils then shrink in terror while a scream fails to escape from your knotted throat; your aching legs flare with intensity from the burn they received at the bottom of that pit, urging you to act now to save yourself from returning. But hit, yell and flail as you will, it is too late now to avoid a second trip; and even as you turn back to claw your way out of a terrible fate that you just escaped from, there’s nothing you can do once the hanged crimson ferryman touches down by your side and the streams join together in a cascade that carries you back to the depths.

And despite all of this happening in quick succession, there’s one thought that prevails in your mind still as the torrent of drool drags you back down Sally’s snack-slide; fully conscious this time. One shocking realization that casts a distracting shadow over the return to your imminent demise, leaving you awestruck and with a certain degree of disgust that’s just barely outdone by the innate repulsiveness of your surroundings.

Did I just get oral from mom?!

***

Having waited for the remedy to take effect, Sally began to feel her stomach to settle down after a moment. She pressed a hand under her breast, and surely, no unusual feelings followed. Glad to solve her problem with discretion, she put away the tonic bottle back into the cabinet and returned to her living room. The night was about to get better after all, Cora’s mixing skills were second-to-none, and her private stash was the best way to do them justice.

Halfway back to her evening of ethylic-enhanced enjoyment, another mild discomfort popped up under her tongue. Fortunately, this one she could hide without fuss, although the bland texture and sour-salty flavor she could do without; must’ve been a piece of chip that didn’t quite go down. Have to fix the dip for the next bowl, this one was a bit bland.

“Sally-dally, we’ve got the shots ready; want to play ‘Aristocritic'?”

Beth called from the living room, to which Sally merrily accepted with her own yell. Nothing better to spice up the night than to contest herself with the other girls in who could take in the most booze while subjected to the corniest movies in her collection, one cheesy line and shot of scotch at a time.

Eager to take out this showing’s feature out of her cabinet, she took out the movie case while her guests were taking their front-row seats and pouring their glasses in advance…
1322121221221.title: Failing the taste-test

13221212212211.content:
Did I just really come on mom’s tongue?!

That question haunts your head still as you slide down the slimy canal of your mother’s esophagus, holding one arm to the side to help you break your descent in a losing battle against the wavy constriction of her throat; and your other hand grasping tightly your tired manhood, hiding it in shame from yourself. The notion of your dirty deed was ripping your mind apart with its storm; for one, that was one of the most amazing things that you’ve ever felt in your life; for two, did you just really, actually jizzed all over the tongue of the woman who brought you to this world for her to taste your/her mistake?! Well, just the tip in fact; and with her in mind to boot.

Back to your more immediate problems: your naked, dampened hide keeps slipping deeper into the chute, or rather, the tube keeps closing and loosing itself around you, and not even the modest coating of your mother’s drool can help you stick to the spastic walls that are hell-bent on bringing you back to the oblivion that you barely survived and escaped from; which would be a bleak fate all in itself, but then you remember that your only sweet salty safe spot was already oozing by the time of your exit; unless there’s another bubble waiting for you just at the bottom of the tract, there will be nothing to save you from taking a dip in the frothy sea of acidic crud that consumes all that falls in it. Opening your eyes, you see the floor below the many fibers of your landing spot; it's most likely a ball of lint on the floor, probably carried over by one of mom's friends, seeing as the living room was just cleaned yesterday. ***

"I.. I think it's gone." Emily spoke lowly as she regained her calm, and then she sat down back on the couch, gasping in relief; her friends still stirred from the commotion, slowly calming down once they also checked that they had nothing crawling on them.

"Girls... *Shush* Overreacting much?" Cora spoke with little empathy, while trying to hide her amusement from the rest; barely able to contain a giggle and forcing herself not to smirk at her friends confusion. Fortunately for her, just as a snort was about to tattle on her, a loud tune started to play from her pockets. Immediately she sprang from the couch, and without as much as a word she excused herself outside while taking her phone out; letting her giggles free once she thought her friends couldn't hear her, before answering her call.

"...Bitch." Emily blurted out as Cora closed the door behind her, well aware of her hidden attitude.

"Leave her be. It's been a rough week at work." Sally said as she also returned to her seat after the throughout patting at her legs. "Besides, yeah, we kinda exaggerated." she concluded.

"Well, then." Beth followed as she broke from the party and strutted into the kitchen.

"Wouldn't it be awful if was bad outside of work too?" She continued as she ducked behind a counter, and then started to examine the cabinets beneath the kitchen sink.

"How so? And what are you doing in there?" Sally asked as she followed her friend to the kitchen. Meanwhile, Tina also got away from the rest as she sneaked to the front door, where she intended to spy on her absent friend; and once there she locked the door and put her ear against it, where the first thing she heard was a muffled, uncontained cackle.

"You're not going to poison her." Sally interrupted once she saw what the bottle that Beth took out was: a bottle of dishwasher.

"Still, don't. It's not fa-" Sally kept arguing before being interrupted herself this time by Tina, who was coming back from the door.
