choices: Sally, your own mother almost drowned you
14521.content:
Before anything else, you start swimming away from the center of the bowl; lest someone becomes thirsty before you make a move. But that won't help, since the first spoonful anyone takes would send waves that would turn your swimming pool into a raging ocean, and possibly towards the next scoop of punch to be taken into a glass. Knowing that, it doesn't get any better since the bowl is too steep to climb and the only thing besides you and a lake's worth of drink is the spoon that was best to avoid.

Wait, of course! The spoon's handle is the best way out of the bowl! Sure it may be risky, downright suicide even. But the alternative is avoiding it as the party goes and hope you don't get drank before the bowl empties or the party ends. Even if it gets emptied the way out would still be harder if it's not by that handle and to hell with that; so you might as well take your chances now.

You start swimming towards the spoon, which thankfully isn't that far to begin with, only to see it lifting up the air by Tina. She's currently chatting with the others, so she doesn't pay attention to the bowl besides making sure she doesn't spill anything. She takes multiple spoonfuls; all the while you get thrown around by the waves. You can't help but to panic as you think either you will run out of breath beneath the punch or she's going to scoop you up and there won't be a way to not get drank. As you flail about she gets her glass full of punch and sets the spoon back down.

When you realize she's over you calm yourself down a bit and go back to the spoon, again thankfully near as she put it down near where the waves carried you, which wasn't that far to begin with. Neverthless, you hurry up your pace before anyone else decides to want some punch and the experience is repeated.

In your haste you forgot to take into account that you're swimming just above the spoon. You bolt directly towards the grip in hopes of escaping this watery prison, and just as you're near the grip everything takes a lift as the next party-goer comes for a bit of refreshment. The sudden lift took you by surprise and you lost your balance and slipped your head beneath the surface. You tried to regain your composture but then the pool tilted backwards and took you with it.

You were drowning now, but after a brief fall you splashed onto another lake. You rushed towards the surface and gasped for air as you hoped in vain that whoever it was slipped her grip on the spoon and dropped you back onto the bowl. But as you saw when your eyes cleared, this wasn't the bowl, this was much smaller, but still pretty big on your perspective. You panicked again, but soon enough another spoonful came cascading towards you, causing you to sink. Frantically you swam upwards trying to surface, but then another one came in and sank you again. This went on for another two times before ceasing, and by now you almost drowned. Gasping for fruit-scented air again, you surfaced and breathed while clearing your eyes from the stuff.

As you did, the pool lifted once again; someone was lifting the glass. Crap!
Luckily for your pant-soiled self, whoever served you into her drink wasn't taking a gulp just yet, and was merely holding it. This gave you time to look up, and to see that your fate was in hands of...
14521.title: Kool Aid

choices: -"Cora, that's my glass you have there."-
145211.content:
It didn't take more than a second of staring upwards for you to identify your mother's choice in clothing overshadowing your swimming pool; the dress she always used for her reunions and whenever she wanted to look classy without spending too much hassle in preparations, though anything beyond her bust was blocked from your view. Even when it feels kind of awkward, you can't help but to feel attracted to her enormous form; she just seems so overwhelmingly beautiful, but at this size she also feels threatening. More so when you take your position into consideration, where a single sip can take you into a no expenses tour through her digestive system. It seems a bit impossible though, the tall walls are made of slippery glass, and even then it meant climbing your colossal mother to safety while not falling down. At least you got all this punch so you don't get thirsty while thinking.

Sally was currently talking to her friends while you were figuring how to get out of this disaster waiting to happen, and so as you were floating and considering your options you eavesdropped some bits of what they were talking about; something about Cora having some issues, Beth's work, and other things you couldn't figure out; which although irrelevant to you it was at least some ambiance to the otherwise calm waves that carried you around while you awaited either a solution to your problem or a problem of dissolution in mom's belly; with the former hopefully happening instead of the latter. The volume of their echoing voices could tone down a bit though.

Just then, the world feels like it's taking a forceful lift upwards as Sally takes her glass closer in to drink some punch. The waves become violent as you are thrown everywhere and even slam into a wall of the glass at some point, good thing that the impact only hurt a little. When it started to calm it also started to tilt to its side, and as soon as you regained your pace you cleared your eyes only to feel the current drawing you away and your mom's amplified face as she was opening her cavernous mouth.

Instantly you turned around and began to swim with everything you got to avoid getting sucked in, which was easier said than done as Sally held the glass with some inclination. With each *GULP!* that echoed through you became more and more panicked, to the point that you just stopped taking breaks to breathe and started paddling like crazy. This proves more than you can handle though, and soon enough you surface only to see mom's gaping maw in full detail as she takes more and more of her drink: her teeth glimmering through the dim light, her tonsils and uvula arching the path that flowed everything into her throat, and her tongue partly beneath the flowing river, only rising on the back briefly everytime a *GULP* was heard and took some liquid down with it. You had to turn back and resume swimming now!

The bottom of the glass seemed to get farther away with each passing second, and at the same time the gulping sound got louder and louder, along with the smell of her breath becoming stronger. As you were just about to fall into the river already in her mouth; by some combination of a adrenaline-high helped swimming, convenient starting position, and pure luck, you managed to hold out as Sally took the glass away from her mouth and put it down the table. Because you were still swimming away towards the bottom you took a dive when Sally shifted the balance of the glass.

Making your way back to the surface, you were shocked to see that the walls of the glass now towered way taller than before, yet Sally didn't seem to take more than a few gulps out of the full glass. Still shocked from that last experience, you relaxed yourself thinking that after that Sally wouldn't take another drink in a while and proceeded to float on your back and just take a break. The waves that were becoming less frequent became more relaxing as you just floated still and let them take you whenever they please, it felt almost like being at a pool; albeit a fruit scented one. Only the ceiling and the glass walls could be seen from here, although looking through the glass the image of the party made itself almost clear, yet the sound of their conversation was still loud enough to be heard.

You were closing your eyes while trying to ignore all that noise and get some peace to rest for a moment; and sure enough, some time passed up. All the while you were thinking about how close that was; to think that a bit closer, that if you hadn't swam that much, you would be now inside mom's belly waiting to be digested, and she wouldn't even notice you were gone until much later after it was too late. The idea itself of being drank its chilling enough, let alone if you lived long enough in her stomach to feel her digestive juices dissolve you along with her lunch; so you try not to think about it anymore. Before you could think of anything to calm down, the glass started lifting once again. The sudden movement made you flinch as the punch started making a wave pool of itself again, one of which takes you beneath the waves. As you surface treading punch and gasping for air, you saw the outline of the hand that was taking the glass towards her mouth. While you cleared your eyes to face your mom and repeat the experience, you heard her voice call out:
145211.title: Sally, your own mother almost drowned you

1452111.content:
-"A toast for your promotion, Beth!"- said your mother, wishing the pretty Beth prosperity in her future. Unfortunately that gesture of goodwill also spells out your ruin; as Sally and Beth both hold their drinks up. Your pool shakes violently as Sally makes another gesture to Beth, and gets even worse when they both clash their drinks with each other. For a moment it looks like you could be thrown out of the glass with some punch that got spilled out, which certainly wouldn't help now since the fall would be greater now. During the toast you were thrown wildly around once again, getting much of the liquid into your mouth and making breathing even harder than before. For the second time today Sally was drowning you in her drink, still unknown to her that you were even there.

By the time the waves settled down and you surfaced the glass was already on Sally's lips, which were open wider than before as she and Beth were now drinking every last drop of their glasses. It was time to start swimming again!, or at least you would, but that last typhoon left you dizzy and breathless enough to not care for anything that wasn't breathing. You floated in place gasping heavily as the current washed you towards Sally's open wide mouth. You only noticed your position once it was too late; only when you heard the familiar sound of her *GULP* and took in air that was heavily scented with Sally's breath of chips, sandwich and who knows what else did you notice that you were just about to enter the cave of wonders known as Sally's mouth.

You fell into the current that was already on Sally's tongue which was undulating with each wave of punch that it dragged into her throat. You tried to start swimming, but the dizziness and lack of breath left you exhausted and unable to move anywhere by yourself, so you were stuck in this ride towards mom's pit of a stomach. While you were still in her mouth you took a glance to see what possibly will be your last sight. Sally's mouth looked bigger inside than from the glass, which now just looks like a small waterfall flowing in; the river that was the punch glimmered along with her teeth in the little dim light that got through the glass, her teeth looked like giant rocks that stood all over creating a perimeter inside the cave. Her tongue was hidden beneath all the punch, but the tip was still visible near the teeth. Just beyond the bottom of the glass, a faint image of one of the women could be seen, but it was heavily distorted and you couldn't determine who.

When your sightseeing act was over, you felt a bit rise in the tide; looking up you saw that the roof of Sally's mouth arched here, and a big ball of flesh hanging down in between. One *GULP* later and everything went pitch black as you and the latest wave of punch went past the tongue and plummeted down Sally's throat. The way down her throat thankfully wasn't nearly as violent as the toast was; for one thing everything was going in one direction instead of everywhere, and you had gotten a bit behind the liquid. Then for a brief moment all the punch and you jerked into a stop and then resumed your fall. A second later and you finally hit something that wasn't completely liquid, the remains of Sally's lunch earlier.

You tried to get up from the stuff that was drenched in liquid as you fell, but as you did the last wave came down and washed you away from the spot. It took a bit of a moment for it to settle down, but when it did it didn't helped much; the place was still pitch black and you were still floating. The major difference was that now the air smelled like someone puked in a bag of chips with some of the fruity scent of the punch in it; yet the air felt somewhat uneasy on you. The sounds of a waving pool that were present in the glass now turned into that of an ocean, with a heavy breathing sound every once in a while; and then Sally's voice which roared so loud it almost hurt. Even when you couldn't see anything it didn't take a rocket scientist to deduce you were in Sally's stomach.

The whole experience has left you exhausted once again, so you just lay back and try to regain some calm. There's no point in trying to swim away anymore, so you got all the time left before you run out of air or get digested to do so. As you lay you take your head underwater in an effort to ignore the deafening noise; but you regret this quickly as some liquid gets in your eyes and starts burning greatly. You wipe them off but still they hurt badly, and you don't have a clean or dry piece of cloth to properly clean it off, so you just get used to it and resume your position. The waves now aren't as calmed as in the glass, as Sally moves constantly and the world rocks around with her, but at least it's barely something. The thick waters feel funny on your body, which was probably starting to digest; so maybe this will be over sooner than you thought.

Eventually you are carried off into one of her stomach walls, which was way harder than that soft stuff you landed on. You had regained a bit of your strengh, so you might as well try one last thing; your skin already feels like burning so it's not like there is something to lose. You position yourself so that you float straight and with all your forces you hit the fleshy wall, only to hurt your hand on the impact. If Sally felt that either she wasn't acknowledging it or you couldn't tell from her deafening voice, but either way her stomach started to rumble about. A particularly large wave swept you off with an increased rage as Sally went on on with the party, and threw you with increased force until you hit the wall with a body slam this time. It hurt bad enough that the acid was tearing your skin, but with that hit it almost felt unbearable. You passed out from a combination of pain and lack of breath, your corroding body mixing in with the mush of her sandwich and chips.

---

*GULP**GULP**GULP*
-"Aaah, thanks for the gesture Sally. I'm sure this job will pay back large, round's on me when the first check arrives"- said Beth in regards of her congratulating friend.
-"You deserved it Beth. But if you say so, I'll make Adam prepare more of this delicious snacks for the occasion. I'm sure when he hears that it's for you he'll crash the kitchen perfecting it for you."- responded Sally.
-"Such a sweet boy you have Sal. But can you ask him next time to cut down on the spice? Tina almost cried when she ate some of it, and she just told me it isn't settling down too well either; and seeing as Cora hasn't returned from the bathroom yet, I'm afraid she's kinda right."-
-"Really? I think Cora just ate too much, but if Tina feels that way maybe she's on to something. I'll tell Adam whenever he decides to show up."-
-"Where is he anyway?"- inquired Beth
-"I don't know, but knowing your little fan he must be in his room thinking about you!"- Sally teased and chuckled about it.
Beth responded by giving Sally a light hit on her arm, -"Hey shut it will ya?! It's bad enough the poor boy gets enough tease, don't make me lose my temper like Cora"- she said with a tone between seriousness and joke.
Sally laughed a bit before clenching her hand over her belly, -"Oh come on! I didn't hit that hard!"- said Beth.
-"It's not that."- responded Sally, her hand easing off, -"I just felt a little tickle down there, maybe I also ate too much"- said Sally, followed by a *GRUMBLE* that came from her
-"Or maybe Tina is right and Adam should go easy with the dip."- joked Beth
-"Yeah, that too."- agreed Sally, her belly grumbling some more as if to also agree with Beth's comment.

---

*FLUSH*
-"Whew, they were right, Adam should cut down on the spice."- said Sally to herself. The party had been over a while ago, your digested remains were mixed in with the rest of her meals of the day and were now finishing the last part of mom's digestive tract tour and making their way to the sewers.
*KNOCK* *KNOCK*
-"Adam are you there?"- asked Sally for your presence, not knowing whatever part of you that wasn't in the pipes was already turning into her body fat. She opened the door of your room, but when she didn't find you there she just assumed you had gone out and would be back later or in the morning.
-"Lousy boy."- she said to herself, just before she burped. The aftertaste of the punch reminded her of you, who had put so much of himself into the preparation of her party snacks, drinks included.
-"Beth's right though, he still is my sweet little boy."- she said before heading to her room and falling asleep.
1452111.title: A toast for accidents

1452112.content:
-"Cora, that's my glass you have there."- said Sally in a clearer tone. Confused as to why mom's voice didn't sound as close as before, you dared to look up to get an answer which would be solved if you had paid attention. That wasn't the case whatsoever, you were more focused in your current situation. The glass started moving once again, only this time it shot up to the skies as it made you sink beneath even more raging waves.

As with before, you were getting thrown around in the punch as it made its way towards Sally's mouth, only its much worse this time since there's less punch in the glass and the little that's left has you mixed in the fun. At least this time you had enough precaution to hold your breath in advance; still, that won't help you once mom starts drinking. There's a lot of noise coming in from outside the glass, yet it is muffled in your ears; though it soon becomes the sound of a rapid river once again.

The glass started tipping once again, and while before you could keep your pace with the current, this time it was stronger, many times stronger, and you were still underwater. Still, you made your best efforts to avoid a trip down the long waterslide known as the esophagus, but the ongoing flow kept becoming stronger by the moment, and soon it felt like trying to swim up a waterfall. In fact, once you got to the surface to breath again; aside from the ever usual stench of a mouth, you noticed that the ceiling was now glass. The bottom of the glass you were in to be exact, being held almost upwards.

You barely had time to react before you bumped into the current that was already in the mouth. The teeth that previously stood out vertically now looked like the opening of a silo, the glass already pouring its last onto the tongue that you fell in a moment ago; which, if you bothered to look back, would see that it's draining the pool you are currently in. Only by hearing the ominous *GULP* you finally reacted with a proper curse in your head as the liquid drained all at once and took you with it. You tried swimming and hanging on her tongue, but the suction proved too great and took you and the punch in.

The way down her throat was mostly like a waterslide, but unlike the waterpark, this one had no means of safety for the rider; luckily, like before you had taken your share of stale air in the mouth so that wasn't much of an issue. Also, like the park, this one still dumped the rider in a relatively shallow pool. *SPLASH* You landed with the last of the liquid into a completely dark cavern, at least, at your size mom's belly would be that big considering what you could see in her mouth looked like that. Immediately after that, you were shaken with the punch as it jostled everywhere. The sounds of gurgling and heavy steps being the only audible thing for now, a distant voice being drowned by the liquid throwing you around.

You were starting to run out of air by now, but fortunately the waves settled down soon enough for you to breathe again; only to get a more suffocated air that smells worse than before, like barf mixed in with the variety of snacks that you were preparing before. There's a slight hint of alcohol in the air, which is strange considering you didn't put any in the punch and Sally said she would be saving the drinks for last. At least you get a last drink before this voyage into mom turns into an acid bath. You hope so at least; the liquid has drained a bit leaving you stranded in relatively dry land, like the tongue but way more slippery. In fact, the place feels somewhat empty; you'd expect at least some of the food remains would be present.

At the same time, the groaning and rumbling all around you goes louder. As the rumbling continues, you hear a distant muffled sound that you can't quite identify, but sounds like someone is on the toilet. The accompanying sighs and groans confirm this, mom must be on the can. At least, it sounds like it, which would explain the footsteps earlier and the absence of food, yet the next sound puts the theory down.

-"Uuunghhh, damn Sal's kid. What did he put in those sandwiches, a whole pig?! Come out now damnit."- said a muffled voice, which certainly wasn't mom, it was Cora! Cora was the most frightening of mom's friends, foul mouthed and aggressive at times, which only got worse when she drank. Which if mom doesn't lie is every other afternoon, and even when she doesn't go overboard with it, it still manages to pump her up, which would explain the smell of booze in the cavern; Cora never assists Sally's reunions without downing a can first.
Even when tipsy she would sometimes joke and flirt with you, one time even saying she could pounce on you and eat you up. Never you thought it would actually happen though.

You consider yourself a bit luckier now, if you were drank when there was still beer here her stomach would have processed you quicker, but then again this would have been over quicker. That sounds must be her intestines pushing out her lunch; which you would follow as long as you remained here, only not as you entered but more like the load that just left. Sadly, as much as she drinks, you have never seen Cora puke out; Sally even says it takes two full bottles of her strongest just to make her uneasy; which limits all your options to wait and digest.
-"Easy in, why can't it be the same way out?"- she continues talking to herself, grossing you out -"MMMMFFFfff. Gonna have to resort to my Dr. Daniels for this."- whether she refers to her alcoholism or actual medication is lost to you, though you doubt your cooking had anything to do with her problems. Judging by the sounds that were happening below, it could go either way.

*FLUSH* you could hear beyond the walls, -"Ugh. I'd hate to be the next one that has to go."- Cora's voice echoed through. You'd hate to be the one to clean if it clogs, but considering your position at most you will be clogging her intestines next.
The sounds of Cora getting up and walking back to the party followed, while in your place you were subjected to the movements that vibrated her stomach, thankfully just slightly so you don't move much. Getting back to the party, Cora's voice got louder as she talked to the rest. This time you couldn't understand quite well what she was saying, neither what the others said as everything came as a muffled whisper, while her voice bombed your ears.

Not being able to get their attention is getting more aggravating by the second, yet there's nothing to do about it. You just move around in her stomach as you wait for something to happen, hoping that if Cora does drink, she will overdo it and vomit you out, even if you have to get out of the puddle before the clean up; it's either that or experience first hand the sounds from earlier.

Their chat continues for as long as you can hear Cora's voice, when suddenly you hear a sound coming from above that isn't her breathing. *GULP* you hear something coming, getting closer until it enters the chamber you're in, Cora is eating again! How can she criticize your cuisine when she's already helping herself another plate? At least she likes it, so she won't be bashing you for it. Not that you will be around to be complimented either, at least not that she knows.
She continues to eat and talk for some while, each time her stomach filling more with masticated snacks. Eventually, you start moving in the mush. You wonder if she will actually stuff herself, when you start hearing more gulping followed by water...

---

-"Cora, that's my glass you have there."-
-"Sorry Sal, gotta go quick."- responded Cora as she drank Sally's glass in one gulp. -"Be right back!"- she bolted to the bathroom. -"That girl.."- she could hear Sally before closing the door. She took down her jeans and sat on the toilet as fast as she could, the pressure in her bowels feeling like a constriction.
-"Goddamnit, always with the shits,"- she said to herself, thinking about everytime this happens -"some people only get to leak, why do I have to drop the bombs?"- she questioned her metabolism.
-"Cora keep it down, we can hear you and it's grossing us out!"- shouted Sally, which advice she heeded for the most part.
-"Uuunghhh, damn Sal's kid. What did he put in those sandwiches, a whole pig?! Come out now damnit."- she almost whispered, trying to pin the blame of her situation on her friend's son. She mostly liked the kid, if anything he kept her entertained whenever she visited, and unlike other people he didn't try to grab a feel of her. Still, he drooled over her friend, and that made Cora a bit jealous.
-"Easy in, why can't it be the same way out?"- she continues talking to herself, emptying herself in the process -"MMMMFFFfff. Gonna have to resort to my Dr. Daniels for this."- she joked to herself as she flushed, not once thinking her alcoholism had anything to do with her bladder control.
The stench she couldn't ignore though, -"Ugh. I'd hate to be the next one that has to go."- she said, opening the window in hopes of the air freshening out, finally getting back to her friends.
1452112.title: A quick drink, pt1

14521121.content:
*MUNCH* -"Sounf yaah"- *MUNCH* *GULP*
-"Cora.."- nagged Sally
-"Sorry!"- excused Cora. -*Sigh*"I'll never know how you do it"- said Beth.
*THUNK* -"Anyway, you want some ladies?"- Cora offered her drink to her friends, which they promptly refused almost at unison. -"Well, bottom's up!"- *GULP**GULP**GULP* Cora downed almost half of her can rather quickly.
-"Cora, you could wait a bit, I got my special reserve already here!"- said Sally. -"Yeah, this is just the warm up, don't want feeling like a two-cans again."- responded Cora. -"A what?"- asked Tina. -"Don't wanna get wasted on this."- answered Cora.
Sally proceeded to serve everyone. -"Your boy hasn't touched this yet, huh."- said Cora to Sally. -"No, don't want him doing so, having to take care of one drunk is enough."- responded Sally
-"Hey! You know, you should let us two have a drink, kid certainly deserves it."- said Cora in a half serious tone. -"You, with him, and two bottles? I don't want to be a grandma yet, and besides, I think you already scared him enough."- snarked Sally.
-"Pfft. As if! I think he enjoyed last time."- Cora snarked back, -"Come here kiddy! If you make kitty wait she will get hungry! If kitty hungry she eats you!"- she quoted her last time she jokingly flirted him, laughing herself off. -"Watch out Beth, if you don't show interest I'm gonna get your admirer for myself."-.
Beth just snarled, -"To this day I still think you weren't joking. If we do leave you to alone next time we want to see him we will have to shove our heads in your throat!"-
Just then, Emily came back from a trip to the bathroom holding her shirt over her nose, -"My god Sal, it reeks! Did you kill a hobo in there?"- she asked before entering in a coughing fit, while the others stared back at Cora, who was finishing her next sandwich.
-"What? I opened the window."- Cora defended, while Sally rolled her eyes. -"If anything you should tell your boy to stop making this things so heavy. Darned appetizing though."- Cora said as she grabbed a handful of chips with dip.
-"Or you could just stop eating like a starving hyena, drinking like a bloated fish, and acting like a total bitch."- cried Beth, prompting Cora to flip her off. -"Like that."- she added, Cora just kept eating and talking about something else.
In her true fashion, she downed quite a few glasses of Sally's strongest, only feeling quite full and just a bit tipsy...

---

Following the gulping sounds, an intense rush of water came next, like some rapids. Sure enough, your masticated mess of a land started flooding in. Strangely enough, this wasn't like the punch which you came in, but smelled strongly like the alcohol scent you'd expect from Cora, and sure enough it felt different from the punch. It was booze, true to her nature, Cora was drinking copious amounts of alcohol, startling you in the process.
This time it was more severe though: it was bad enough she had started eating, so her stomach would start bathing everything in acid and grinding everything into paste; metabolizing alcohol would require extra effort, which to you translates into extra pain.

You moved frantically away from the liquid, getting covered in mush in the process. Getting to solid ground was getting harder though, Cora kept drinking and flooding your island into a sunken wreck, at the same time, drenching you and making sure you yourself won't get thirsty anytime soon.
You eventually ditched the idea of getting to dry land, or just getting out of this alive altogether. Cora had drank you, and not only did she not notice it but she was actually eating more and drinking enough to pass you off as little more than an extra ingredient in her drink.

After a while, by a combination of an exhausted body, lack of fresh air, and all the ingested booze, you start thinking about your situation in a hazed manner.
- Thinking about it, it was actually funny: you were like the worm in the tequila bottle. And thinking back, this really looked like the water park, only better, you were the only one and it wasn't going dry anytime soon. It even had it's own fun water slide entrance, and the water it's booze, what could be better?
If it had better illumination, maybe some ambiance music that didn't sound so echo-y and it didn't smell like rotten cabbage, you could see this place getting more visits. But maybe Cora thought so too, and then it wouldn't be your personal pool anymore. So considerate of her, you've got to invite her a round of mom's secret stash some time.-

As your mind went on with your drunken haze, your body just floated by. As you did, Cora kept eating, each entering bite adding to the pile of mash that was the last sandwich. By the end of it, the stomach already started pumping acids in, which you felt as the liquid got slightly thicker. Other than that, you were too distracted to notice any sensations in your skin.
By then, the next *GULP* let a rushing river into the now cramming space, you recognized this one as one of mom's special blends. You drank some yourself, -so considerate of Cora, knowing mom won't let you try it so she sneaks some in for you.- you think. Though, it tastes different from the time you secretly had some yourself, so tangy..

The acids proceeded to mix in with the liquid, while Cora's stomach worked hard to process all of this. Even when it was digesting you, you barely felt a tingle as your body became more and more like the remains of the sandwich you were treading into earlier. At most, you wondered - why do your fingers feel so short now? And why your eyes feel like they're melting? And why everything feels so numb? Why...-.

Eventually, following the snacks, your whole body sank beneath the acids, mixing in with the rest of the solid food and finally becoming something her intestines can work with.
Your last registered thoughts before fading were, -that it sounds like when you first got here, for all her niceness, Cora does have some rudeness when it comes to the bathroom; though if she wasn't doing business, how her ass would look bare, must be nice..-, as her stomach grounded your remains into paste.
14521121.title: A quick drink, pt2

145211211.content:
*Later*

*GROAN* -"This is some nice stuff Sally.. Have I told you you're my best friend? I.. I love you girls.."- Cora said, barely aware of her own words.
-"Uuh, thanks. Cora, you all right?"- asked a concerned Sally. -"Sure I am, look!"- responded Cora as she tried balancing herself on one foot, almost falling over doing so.
-"Quite, I think this was too much for you this time."- said Sally, -"Here, let me help you out. Beth, you grab her left arm, on three we drag her over to the bed."- she instructed, adding a -"I hate when she overdoes it."-
-"I think it's cute, where's Adam, he's got to see this."- asked Beth, -"I told you I don't know, besides, the farther we keep her drunken self from everyone the better."- responded Sally
-"Oooohhh, where's the little boy! Here little boy, kitty wants to play! Raarrr! Kitty wants little boy to play with! Don't make kitty come after you!"- called the drunken Cora, trying to mimic cat gestures while yawning and being dragged by her arms.
-"There she goes."- snarked Sally

After that last speech, Cora fell asleep on her friends. Beth and Sally dragged her back to your bedroom, not finding you there they laid her on the bed and went back to the party. Over the course of Cora's sleep, her body went on to fully digest her meal, her innards roaring louder than her voice was just moments ago, and even then it wasn't enough to wake her up. She slept from the evening all the way to next day's noon, as if she overworked for the last few days.
In the meanwhile, the contents of her bowels became more absorbed into her, your remains included, before everything else turned into waste. A few bone fragments weren't fully digested, sticking out on her waste.

The next day, Cora felt slightly groggy, but still fully rested as she got up. The first thing she thought was that she passed out on her friends, which wouldn't be the first time; but seeing your room, and her clothes mangled, she fears she might have gone a bit too far with you this time, thinking about what she said yesterday.
That feeling she got quickly over, as soon a *GROAN* and an enormous pressure in her abdomen urged her to rush to the bathroom. Sitting herself, she relieved herself of yesterday's load. A few bones of yours stuck to her rectum, while the rest dotted her waste.
-"Unngf. That soreness better be his cooking and not what I think."- she groaned as she unloaded what she could swear felt like half of her total weight. As she finished and got to wipe herself, she couldn't clean some of your remains that stuck and made her itch. -"I really don't want to know why it's sore anymore.."- she kept talking to herself.

Getting to the living room, she met Sally in the kitchen, eating her breakfast. Greeting each other, and getting nagged by Sally for her drunken display yesterday, Cora asked her about you.
-"I don't know, he didn't came back yesterday. Must have gone to an appointment himself."- Sally replied. -"Phew, for a moment I thought I gave him a 'treat' in my happy hour."- responded Cora in relief.
-"Cora, I wouldn't let him get near ten miles from your drunken ass were he a tiger tamer."-
-"What, you let him get hard for Beth yet not let him get near this lovely lady? Some buzz kill."- responded Cora.
-"Are you sure you've sobered up? You drank too much yesterday, got again with that 'kitty' thing."- Sally began telling her about her behavior yesterday...
-"Hehe, I think I did, didn't I... Well anyway, can I have some breakfast too? All nighter got my appetite worked up."-
-"Sure, what do you want?"-
-"Whatever you're having, just no more sandwiches, or anything your kid put in them, feels like a birth on the way out."-
-"Would you cut that already? Tina almost puked herself out with your talk yesterday, and poor Emy must have been traumatized when she went herself."-
-"OK, sheesh. Just tell your boy when he comes that he's out of air freshener in his bathroom."- Cora said before settling herself to eat breakfast, which along with you will make for a nice part of her rump.
145211211.title: A quick drink, aftermath

choices: -"Oh please Tina, the bowl's over there and I'm thirsty."-
145212.content:
Looking towards the opening of the glass, a colossal figure filled most of the view: a mountain side that went into the sky and curved outwards at its peak; one of mom's friends, and while you couldn't see her face, you could still hear the voice that made the glass shake with each spoken word. It was Beth, mom's loudest voiced friend and one of the most beautiful of them, and she already knew you thought that way of her since that time your mom asked you to decide who was the best looking among them and you could only point to Beth and blush, and ever since none of her friends or mom has wasted the chance to tease you on it.

Beth was holding the glass at waist level, so the figure before the glass was her amazingly big body, the curves that stood out at the top were her breasts that blocked the view of her face from your point of view. While you couldn't see clearly from the red punch, you still could make out the outline of things outside the glass: for the most part, there's the outline of her hand holding the glass you're suspended in; on the rest there's the figure of her waistline and below the surface the punch distorts the image of her legs.

As you admire this giant beauty you briefly forget that you're in the middle of a life threatening situation; you just float over the punch as it softly carries you around while you watch and gasp in awe of the magnificent sight; you even forget that just moments ago this woman was unwittingly drowning you in the very tasty liquid you're currently resting on, while in her innocent eyes she was just serving herself a drink.

To remind you of your predicament, she starts lifting the glass up. The sudden movement threw you off your staring bliss for a moment, but then you resumed staring up the opening of the glass as Beth's face came into view. At normal size she was beautiful, but in this magnified view she was stunning. The glass's movement stopped for a little while as Beth was still talking with friends, and even in the deafening boom of her already loud voice, you could still make out what they were talking about:

Tina: -"Gee Cora, you should try loosening up a bit, that was probably a lighthearted joke"-
Beth: -"Tina's right Cora, if you keep being such a bitch first you're gonna scare little kids, then you're gonna catch some fleas, and before you know it we're going to have to carry you on a leash and drop you in a pound!"-
Cora: -"Oh shut up you two! I wasn't being that mean anyways, and besides if that asshole went away crying after I only had a little word with him after all that bullshit he made me endure, then he deserved it.
Sally: -"She has a point people, and besides..."-

Ok, maybe you couldn't make out what were they talking about, but at least you could understand it. Right as your mom started talking the glass started moving again, and again you were threw off your focus. Now you were focusing on the beautifully enlarged face of Beth, which seemed to grow per second. As it came closer you figured that she was going to take a drink! You started moving towards the side of the glass that was tipping over and towards her face, and as soon you saw her lips getting closer and closer you start swimming with all your strengh towards the opposite direction.

As the glass made contact with the lips the punch started flowing towards them; to your luck she hadn't opened her mouth completely to take a big gulp of punch, just enough to take a few sips, which still looked like a river flowing into a cave. *Sip* *Gulp* *Sip* *Gulp* Was the sound that accompanied the lazy river you were on. You could see a bit of the inside of her mouth, which glimmered with the liquids flowing into it; it was quite a sight, matching the beauty that was causing it. As you were distracted admiring this new sight you heard each sipping and gulping getting louder, and that the cave was getting bigger with each sip; you weren't as far from her mouth anymore! You started swimming again, just in time to not get sucked in with the punch. For a moment you realized the full danger of your predicament and what would happen if you got careless again: you would get drank, get sent to her stomach, and either drown or digest away; and all while Beth hasn't the tiniest clue you were even in the same room, let alone in her drink.
Even while getting close to her has been an amazing experience the prospect of getting that close is a chilling one, best avoided.

As you were thinking that, Beth set the glass down on the table, where everyone was either eating or talking; except for Cora, which after the discussion left for a bathroom break. A bit later Beth grabbed again the glass you were on, and as she was going to take a drink she was interrupted by an anxious sounding Tina: -"Beth honey, I had too much spicy dip and my tongue's burning and my glass is empty and PLEASE CAN I HAVE THAT ONE PLEASE QUICK!!!-" she almost shouted out loud.
Beth's response was:
145212.title: Beth, whose voice was loudest

1452121.content:
-"Sure, here! Take it quick!"-
The punch flavored swimming pool you were suspended in took a shocking turn as soon as Beth said those words. She rushed the glass from her grasp to Tina's hand to help her friend in her dip-induced despair. To you, this meant the monumental Beth got farther away from you as the punch became a lake in the middle of a storm, with you as an adrift survivor.

For a brief moment the image of Beth was replaced by that of Tina's outside the glass's opening, then the glass started ascending quicker than when Beth handed it; and Tina's face came closer and closer. You knew what was coming next: like with Beth, she would take a drink from your pool, so you had to start swimming now lest you become a party snack! You swam to the side of the glass opposite her face, and by when you reached it you looked back to see her face.. only to see the glass tipping over onto the void, as she were emptying the glass onto the floor.

A second after, the sound of waves became the sound of a violent river once again, so she was definitively emptying out the glass. Instantly you wonder why she would empty the punch in an emergency, which gives you the hope that maybe she saw a minuscule dot in the punch, and she was grossed out so she emptied the glass to serve herself another. That was your only hope right now; and while that relieved you a bit, it prevented you from noticing Tina's face beyond the waterfall.

Just as you were about to come out of the glass with the cascading liquid, you could notice outside that her face was inclined and just below the glass. Which meant the punch was cascading into her mouth. As soon as you noticed this, you resumed your swimming escape, only to notice that the inclination of the glass rising and your river flowing faster. You only delay your fall, as the last of the pool cascades into her mouth and takes you with it. You can only hold your breath as for a second you look to the outside of the punch and with a red tinted vision you see the distorted image of Beth looking with concern towards Tina, then everything goes dark and you splash onto another pool.

While you tried to find the surface you scrambled to position yourself; it was so dark with and the only light that entered came from outside Tina's lips, which closed as soon as the last drop entered the cave. By then you floated to the surface, only to find a cramped space with little air to breathe. As you gasped in for some air, you noticed it was rank with the scent of the inside of a bag of chips and dip, bad breath and the punch that by now you were used to. You were in Tina's mouth.

Just then, the whole mouth took a shake, and you were thrown everywhere around the mouth in the punch. You hit the teeth, her tongue, everywhere as Tina tried to take the spicy flavor off her mouth. After a bit of this, on top of being scared and out of breath, now you were also dazed. Luckily the waves settled down again, and after finding the surface, you noticed that the water level had decreased, so this could only mean one thing, and sure enough you heard the confirmation of your fears. *GULP!*

She was swallowing now! Now it seems even less likely to get out of this alive, but it's not the time to give up either! You swim to whichever direction the punch is not flowing towards, where a one way trip into her throat awaits. If only there was a way to let her know you're here.., but shouting is out of the question since you got to save the precious rank air you have, and even then she wouldn't hear you anyways. As you swim you can only hear the sound of the flowing river, which stops only when a *GULP!* is followed. You got to try or that view of Beth will be the last thing you ever saw.

Suddenly, a piece of chip mush dislodges from her teeth and hits you, which not only throws you of your swim sets you back right in front of Tina's throat entrance. You throw the mush away only to fall start falling down Tina's throat as the cascade of punch drags you with it. You slide down her esophagus with the drink for a moment before hitting a stop and falling again. This time you fall even quicker as you hit soft ground full front.

The remaining liquid that was in the glass made its way too into Tina's throat, and each wave landed on your back as you tried to stand up. You get on your feet after that last wave, finally having something to stand up on; though it wasn't easy as the "ground" was more of the soft mush. You open your eyes and clear them from the mush that stuck to your face when you fell; it was burning your eyes! As you do, you "see" that you were in an even darker place than before, if that's possible. It even had a worse smell, like before but now with an acrid air and vomit scent thrown into the mix. The sound of the stream was replaced by thumps and bellows, with fizzing a bit in the distance. The worst has happened, you are in Tina's stomach; her voice now booming beyond understanding as if to make the point painfully clear.

As the realization hit, you slumped over to sit yourself in this mess, the mush you were sitting on was so soft that you almost fell through it; figuring its already digesting, you move the farthest you can from the parts that are below the "water", the mixture of acid and punch that was lethal in its own right, but then Tina had eaten enough spicy dip to down a glass that fast, so you imagine that made it way worse. Guiding yourself by getting a distance away from where the fizzing sounds, while sometimes almost tripping into the mush, you recognize from the smell: these are the remains of the chips and dip and sandwiches you were preparing just a while ago, before this began. At least now you know they liked it, but now you wish you had put something that would help you out in this mess. Not that you knew you would end up in the menu anyway.

When you find a "safe" spot, you lay down and think about all of this. Instead of thinking all the ways this could have been avoided, you think what would have been if Beth would have been a bit more selfish. You would still be in a similar situation, but at least you would be in the belly of someone you think beautiful, and you would have had the image of Beth's gorgeous face as the last thing you saw; which somehow would make the situation a little better. As you think, you heard another *GULP* accentuating the usual sounds of ambience. This was followed by a tremendous force landing on you, which pinned you down and made you sink a bit. You were just below the entrance to the stomach! The mush you were on was already leaking with the acid mixture, and your skin started to feel funny. Knowing that you were now going to be digested, you thought one last time about those in the party, and what was going outside. Just then, you heard another *GULP*...

---

*SWISH**SWISH*
*GULP* *GULP* *GULP*
-"Ahhhhhhh. Thanks a lot Beth!"- Said Tina to her friend, wiping her mouth from the few splashes that didn't fall in her mouth
-"You're welcome Tina. Now ease off the dip, OK?"- Said Beth, calming down from her friend's little despair. She even forgot she was thirsty after the scare Tina gave her, she thought she would drink so fast she would choke!
-"Yeah, I've had enough of that."- Tina said before switching her focus to Sally, -"Sal, what did you put in the dip anyway? Radioactive chillis?"-
-"Actually I didn't made the dip Tina, Adam was behind the preparation of everything."- Asked Sally
-"Well tell him he needs to ease off the chilly next time! I felt as if a volcano had erupted in my mouth!"- Tina remarked
-"By the way, where's your boy Sally? Shouldn't he be here asking Beth out or did you not tell him she was coming?"- Asked Emily, followed by a -"Shut up!"- from a blushing Beth
-"I don't know, he was supposed to greet you, but when I came down he wasn't here, must have gone out so we don't tease him."-
-"Well tell him he makes some good sandwiches though, just look at Tina she's already devouring another one!"- Said Beth to change the subject
-"A bit heavy though"- came the voice of Cora, who was back from the bathroom, -"That one felt like if it was anchored to my ass!."-
-"Don't be so gross!"- shouted Sally

---

As the party went on, you were digested with the rest of Tina's meal, all the while she was talking or dancing. By the time the party finished and everyone was going home, your remains were indistinguishable from the rest of her stomach's contents. Tina and Beth carpooled back to their block, and soon Beth pulled over Tina's house.
-"Well it was fun,", said Beth, "tiring, but I can't wait for the next time."-
-"You say so because you want to se Adam"- snarked Tina
-"Shut up! As if you don't want to, you ate so much you would have eaten him if he was serving you another plate!"- remarked Beth
-"Hey you said it yourself, it was delicious."- Said Tina as she got out of the car, when a *GURGLE* sounded from within her.
-"Sure it was."- commented Beth, -"Well, see ya later."- she said as Tina closed the door behind her and she drove away.
-"Sure it was.."- confirmed Tina as she patted her belly and went home.
1452121.title: Bottom's Up

1452122.content:
-"Oh please Tina, the bowl's over there and I'm thirsty."-

Sounded the ever-loud voice of Beth, denying to share her drink with both voice and gesture, as she waved her finger in a negating way. Meanwhile, just barely in your field of vision, Tina herself started waving her hands to ventilate her mouth, her eyes visibly wet and tears running down to her cheeks. She kept pleading with Beth for something to quench her thirst, -"BETHPLEASEBETHPLEASEBETHPLEASEEEEEEEEEEE!!!"- she was crying out, panting exhaustively; all the while you only watched while floating in the disclosed drink. One of these women was about to finish the drink, and possibly you with it. While with Beth drinking you wouldn't fare any better, Tina's thirst meant an express ticket to your doom; and besides, getting this close to Beth was such a dreamy situation, though the trip to her bowels was going too far. Still, there's not much that can be done anyway.

At that same moment, Tina's sight shifted her focus from Beth's face to the glass, her eyes glaring you and one hand reaching to you, still screeching for Beth's mercy. You used this moment to flail your arms in the liquid, hoping that she would see either you or the splashes, and hopefully take you out of the glass. You didn't wave for long though, as the force that made a typhoon out of the punch whenever it seemed like you would make any kind of progress made itself present once again. Splashing forward on your face, you began drifting once more in the liquid as the glass got lifted from the table, your underwater presence partially muting their voices and making your eyes getting sore from all the waves of punch.

Surfacing, you struggled to wipe your eyes clean from the bloody red waters, the current of the waves still carrying you around. Wondering why the air is getting warmer, you slowly open your eyes hoping that she just put the glass underneath a lamp, but you already know better. Instead, you find yourself in a stream flowing rapidly into the glimmering cave from earlier. You fall into Beth's mouth, splashing into the red lake formed within, nearly landing on the white barricade of her teeth behind, bumping on top of her tongue as the rest of the punch is deposited around.

Getting yourself straight, you find yourself facing a dark passageway further into the cavern, guarded lonely by a hanging ball that bobbed around along with each ripple in the lake below. Scared, you turn back from the pit to find the outside world staring back at you in the form of a very upset Tina. She is crying, panting and overall pleading, all the while looking directly at you. You shout and wave to her, trying to get some footing on Beth's tongue, then falling from the slippery slope formed as her tongue begins to rise. With you now back into the liquid, you hear the noise that signals your impending doom as Beth starts swallowing, dragging you towards the back of her mouth. Terrified, you turn back towards Tina, who is still making choking expressions, and keep screaming and flailing in an effort to let her know of your presence.

To your surprise, it seems to work, as her eyes widen as she wipes off the tears with her hands. Conversely, this focus to gain her attention made you pay less attention to the gaping hole just behind you, draining Beth's mouth from its contents and leading you into the depths of her beautiful body. Only when you felt a huge force pulling you back and Tina was replaced by darkness in your vision did you realized you were already into Beth's throat! You could only keep yourself from drowning as you kept descending until you reached an open space that could only be her stomach.

You find yourself trapped in a sightless place, flooded with everything you were in just a moment ago plus whatever Beth has been eating for the past hours, damp to no end. Taking your time to breath again, a rank smell not unlike stale water became your only source of air. At least you could breath, even if only slightly; your vision was severely limited to nothing at all. Trying to call Tina again, the echo of your own voice was not much compared to the sounds of the waves of punch breaking around, and were soon drowned by Beth's own voice; talking and at the same time making you wish her teeth severed your ears earlier.

Still, you keep hope that Tina, beside her watery eyes and your microscopic state, somehow managed to spot you in Beth's drink and was now convincing Beth to let you out. While Beth's voice was too loud to be heard, Tina's voice came through Beth's body, if incredibly low. While you couldn't understand most of it, you picked up 'I saw' and 'Choke on'. Hopefully she means she saw you and suggests she would cough you out, otherwise it's a Beth brand bubble acid bath for you. Though, speaking of Beth and baths...

Then Beth started talking again, before all hell broke loose as the contents of her stomach began shaking around, you included, in a motion not unlike a washing machine. Holding onto your rescue theory, this hopefully is Beth rushing to the sink to take you out.

---

-"Oh please Tina, the bowl's over there and I'm thirsty."- said Beth, rather irked on her friend's reaction. -"BETHPLEASEBETHPLEASEBETHPLEASEEEEEEEEEEE!!!"- Tina kept pushing, crying and choking on her own tongue, her eyes fixed on the glass as if it was an elixir of life. She pleaded and cried, but Beth just waved her finger in denial.

With tears clouding her vision, she decided to skip asking and just take the glass for herself, but Beth quickly intercepted it, much to her dismay. Anxious, she could only watch as Beth quickly emptied the punch in her own mouth, forming a pool as she removed the glass from her lips. Beth used this to tease Tina a bit, and instead of swallowing she just stay still and let Tina stare into her open mouth, filled with a drink she couldn't have.

Tina stared at her friend's poor taste in pranks for almost a full minute as she continued to gasp. She couldn't tell if it was because of her cloudy vision, but the ripples formed on the water in Beth's mouth made her think she was holding her laughter. Then, just as that, Beth swallowed and Tina's answer to her plight went down her throat, her mouth still open wide for Tina to see. The other women just let out a slight giggle, while a frantic Tina, now desperate, went straight to the punch bowl and, taking it by the sides, lifted it to her face and downed it in a few gulps.

Eased a bit over her burned tongue, Tina turned her attention to Beth, now joining her friends with an innocent giggle. Tina however, was not amused, -"Beth, what the hell was that about?!"- she asked, really upset. Beth just shrugged and responded calmly -"Tina, it wouldn't kill you to take a few steps and serve yourself another glass."-

-"Damn it Beth! I almost choked there! Much like you almost choke on your own laughter, you cunt!"- Tina almost shouted, the other women just watching the unfolding spectacle. -"I wasn't laughing Tina, it was just a lighthearted joke, no need to get calling each other names."- responded Beth, trying to calm her down.

-"I saw your mouth shaking. It looked like you could barely contain yourself."- Tina said, pouting with her arms crossed facing away from Beth. -"But I wasn't at all. Tina, do you think I would laugh at you like that?"- Beth apologized.

-"Well, you are now."- Tina responded, still upset. -"Because now its funny. Come on, it's just a little joke."- Beth poked Tina, almost going in for a tickle.

-"Then why did it look like that? It certainly wasn't your tongue."- said a skeptic Tina. -"My little show for you? Probably it was nothing. What, did an ant mistake my glass for a kiddie pool? You were seeing things Tina."- Beth reassured her friend.

-"But.."- Tina replied, still not believing. -"Tina, I swear I didn't laugh at you. Whatever you saw probably you imagined it. How about laughing together? Here, you like your drinks shaken right? Let me mix you something up."- Beth tried cheering up her friend, holding her belly with both hands and shaking it up and down.

-"...Heh"- Tina finally began to calm down, seeing no further point in staying mad. -"See? now, why don't you shake up yourself girl, come show these ladies our routine. Show them how to dance!"- Beth encouraged her friend, which immediately complied. Tina went on to show off her much practiced dance moves, carrying on with the party...
1452122.title: Party games

14521221.content:
The violent jarring motion comes to a cease sooner than you expected. Making your head stop from spinning, you take a moment to notice that, while the scent of vomit is there, your safety is still far from granted. Waiting a moment in the settling waves to see if she tries it again, you become more desperate as instead you hear Beth talking and not letting out even a burp.

Between deafening rounds of your mom's loudest voiced friend, you can also hear other voices from outside, and like Tina, the all come a bar or two above muted, barely enough to understand a word or two of what they say. Unfortunately, none of them seem to mention you at all, which greatly dims your hopes of survival.

That is until, you hear what could be either mom's or Cora's voice say Adam, Like and Sweetheart. Not enough to make sense of a sentence, and certainly nothing that remotely hints that they even know you're missing. Still, you feel intrigued as to what they would be saying of you, other than how much you like the woman that drank you.

Moments later, you hear the sounds of chewing coming from above. Hearing as Beth gulps, you brace yourself for the incoming food. Not two seconds later after it entered Beth's stomach, the resulting shockwave made apparent that you were too close to the falling debris as it carried you back a bit. The smell changed, though not much for the better, as you recognized the smell of bread and chipotle mayo you used to make sandwiches about an hour ago.

---

Tina just kept swaying to the rhythm, thanking her friends on their assorted compliments. Swaying her hips side to side, she moved with coordinated grace, while her friends kept watching and complimenting.

-"You think she can win a contest?"- whispered Sally to Beth. -"There's one at Velvet's tomorrow night. I thought about entering, but that's more Tina's thing. Wanna come?"- Beth told Sally about their future plans.

-"I'll pass, thanks. I think after what Cora did last night it's best if I skip those places for a while."- Sally responded, laughing awkwardly while remembering her over-reactive friend's last trip to a club.

-"OK. You know, I used to practice with Tina for that. But then work came by, and then they say it's a single contestant thing."- Beth reminisced. -"Bullshit."- Sally let out her comment, before Beth resumed. -"Right so. Well, the promo came with a nice bonus. But aside from that, I like the results that little dance sessions left me."- Beth looked back at a still dancing Tina, grinning slightly, before turning the attention back to herself, showing off to Sally.

-"Yeah, I know Adam will love it too."- Sally said, smirking. -"Oh, you're going with that again?!"- Beth said, frowning. -"You think I would forget how much my little sweetheart likes a friend? As soon as I told him you were coming he dived into the kitchen to make these snacks."-

-"The ones that almost left Tina without a sense of taste?"- Beth snarked back at Sally. -"Oh, I think he didn't pay attention to what he was doing. You know, thinking about you and the like. He knows how much you like his sandwiches, he made them all just for you."- Sally said, with a smile and tone overdosed on sacharine.

-"Well.. that's nice, he sure makes good sandwiches."- Beth said, turning over to the plate, before grabbing one for herself. -"Don't worry about having too many of them, Adam will gladly make more as soon as you tell him. Just wait until he bothers to show up."-

*Sigh* -"Just don't say any of that in front of Cora. I think she's jealous."- Beth shushed Sally's lips.

---

As Beth's stomach fills more and more with party snacks, your swimming space becomes more and more occupied by the incoming pulp. Each gulping sound precedes another addition to the pile of food that slowly builds up in the cramping chamber. You decide to stay on the building pile rather than in the surrounding lake, since it probably is starting to mix with her acids.

You notice that after a brief pause in the food intake, the rank air starts getting more acrid, slightly warmer. Suddenly, a blob of thick, warm slime falls on your left shoulder, despite no indication that Beth was still eating. Your entire left arm starts to feel tingly from the slime, to which you need no further instructions to drop and roll as if it were a fire to wipe it off. Even though it still felt itchy, you managed to rub off most of the acid on the pasty mush beneath you.

Still, more splashes and grumbling sounds indicate Beth's digestive process is bringing your end. And to think this beautiful woman happened to be your resting place, at least that is some consolation. Whatever part of Beth's body you were going to become, you can only think on how it will add to her perfect complexion. Still, you wish you were around to see it, at least from the outside.

Luckily for you, Beth continues to eat, sparing you some time from the dissolving food. Still, that doesn't save you from the occasional drop of acid leaking over you. After some time, her stomach has finished processing her meal. By then, you were mixed in with the rest of her digesting food, burning and on the verge of losing consciousness. Then her stomach began draining its contents into her small intestine, where you finally passed away, wondering if Beth would ever know you ended adding up to her body..

---

-"Well Sally, thank you for such a nice evening!"- Beth said her farewells, joined by Tina.

-"Anytime girls. Well, see you later. I gotta wait for Adam and tell him about Cora, hope he doesn't mind sleeping on the couch tonight."- Sally added, holding her hand to her forehead.

-"Got to love how she can down half a barrel without even stuttering, yet two cups of hard liquor and she's out cold. Tell the kid I say hi!"- Said Tina, before getting into Beth's car.

-"Um Sal, if I may. I think it was too nice of Adam to help out and set up for us. If you want, tell him he's welcome to spend the night at my house. It's the least I can do."- Beth said, almost blushing.

-"Thanks Beth. I'll tell him. I'm sure he'll be so excited he won't want to leave."- Sally added, as Beth boarded her car and went to drop Tina to her house.

---

Beth had waited well into the night wondering if her guest was ever going to show up. She had prepared some dinner for them both, but since you never showed up she ended eating both rations. In a way, she did serve you food, or at least, she sent your portion into your current place inside her.

In the same way, you did end up as her guest, although a more permanent one. Of course Beth wouldn't know better, but her little boy would get his wish of being with her.

That morning, Beth woke up with a strain in her bowels. Making her way into the bathroom, still half sleep she sat on the toilet. Thinking about a dream she had last night, about Adam coming home and receiving him with a big hug, before giving him a chance with her. She didn't think she would actually feel this way over him, though probably she just had too much to drink the night before. Still, she actually expected to find herself half clothed, Adam on the other side of her bed.

-"Ow!"- she whimpered as she felt a little scratch in her rump. -My, just what was that?- she asked herself, as a series of tiny white fragments embedded to her waste made their way down. Flushing her business on the toilet, Beth proceeded to begin her day proper by taking a nice shower.

Amidst the warm water rushing on her body, Beth felt inclined to play racy with herself, thinking about her dream last night. Though, as she was about to give a particularly detailed sponge wash to her navel, she accidentally dropped her sponge. Not paying much attention, she bent over to pick up the loose cleaner when another itching pain presented itself in her rear quarters.

-"OW!"- she repeated herself. Scratching the inside of her round rump with her nails, she felt around for the rogue itch. Scratching around, she came by with a tiny solid object that didn't quite fell with the rest of her waste. She wanted to know what was the rude intruder spoiling her shower, but as she took it out, her soapy hand fumbled it away. Before she had a chance to see what it was, the rush of water had carried it into the drain.

Not giving it a second thought, Beth noticed as the itch was gone. Now free to continue her fantastic shower, she sat on her back in the shower as she proceeded to give herself a nice, slow sponge bath...

Almost an hour later, a very relaxed and satisfied Beth came out of the bathroom after drying herself, though her back did sore a bit. Gathering her clothes from her drawer, she gave a second thought about entering the competition with Tina. Sure she also had a chance of winning, and maybe she could show off to her friends, to Adam even...

That is, until she tried on her clothes. Her bra felt a bit more stuffed, her breasts feeling like popping free from the size-too-small undergarment. Her panties felt tighter than she remembered. Glancing herself in the mirror, she also noticed her belly was also curvier, though not by much.

-That's what I get for eating for two.. Oh well, I bet the little kid will love these changes, since he was partially responsible for them.- she thought, giving away a little burp, before leaving her home to pick up Tina, ready for another good day.
14521221.title: Party on, Pt. 2

14522.content:
You swim to the side of the bowl as fast as you can, in a desperate attempt to get away from this madness. You are nearly there, you reach the edge of the bowl and clamber up onto the rim, looks like you are going to be free after all.

BAM. The bowl shakes all of a sudden as your mother places the cups on the table and one of them accidentally hits the bowl you are in. You are sent toppling back into the sweet punch.

You were caught by surprise, and you fall headfirst into the punch, swallowing a lot of punch while you are it. You start chocking like mad, and resurface only to start coughing and tearing up violently. Unfortunately, no one hears this as your mom is busy laughing with her friends about something completely irrelevant to your situation.

You swim once more to the edge of the bowl and attempt to reach for the rim, but you realize you are way too late as the shadow of a cup appears over you and hits you right on the head. You sink to the bottom, world spinning, and without being able to control it, you topple inside the cup under the punch water, to be brought up with the cup and the punch.

Your entire world is being rocked ever so wildly as the woman with the punch brings it up to her mouth. You mange to position yourself still for one fleeting second before you notice with horror that it's your mom with the punch in her hand. She brings it near her mouth and you are forced to swim deeper into the cup to avoid being drunk up by your own mother.

You manage to survive the first gulp, and hold your breath as the cup hits the table and you are momentarily submerged under the punch once more.

You realize with terror that this could be your last chance, so you swim quickly to the rim of the cup but end up slipping on something at the rim. Upon smelling your hand, you realize it's your mothers lipstick. Unfortunately, you had wasted way too much time by then and Sally grabs the cup for another long sip.

Sally is laughing with Cora about something when she takes a thirsty gulp from the punch, she savors the taste quickly before swallowing. She could have sworn something felt solid in that punch. But she doesn't give it much thought as she puts the empty cup on the table.

Adam is being thrown around as his mother swallows him whole without even gagging due to the slippery punch and is coated with her saliva as he travels down her throat and lands with a 'plop' in her stomach. He realizes there are remnants of food in there and gags at the moist and deadly environment. The stomach gurgles and he slips face first into the vomit smelling food. He throws up and starts screaming, but it is all in vain as no one could hear him from here.

To his horror, he realizes the stomach is beginning to secret digestive enzymes...
14522.title: Swim To the Side of the Bowl!

145221.content:
Sally sits down and starts eating snacks with her friends, talking about life's issues, as she places her hand on her gurgling stomach.

"Wow, Sally, your stomach is really working!" giggles Cora at Sally's gurgling stomach.

"Haha, everything in there is having a party" joked Sally, and the girls all laughed.

Adam heard his mothers comment, and starts crying as her new, chewed up food, lands all over him and plops on his face. His skin is beginning to melt off at this point, and he can see his bones beginning to appear. He throws up, and realizes he is vomiting blood. He sobs one last sob and collapses in his mothers mess, never to wake up again.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------

Sally wake up the next morning after a long night of partying, and realizes she didn't see her son in a while. She shrugs, guessing he had spent it somewhere else, and stretches, getting up and letting out a fart. She plugs up her nose as she realizes it's very bad smelling. She realizes she needs to poop, so she heads over to the bathroom and closes the door.

Sally takes off her panties, since they were the only thing she slept in, and sits on the toilet, letting out a few more farts. She screws up her facial features in concentration as the tip of a long turd starts peaking. It starts coming out, and something scratches her anus, making her giggle. She looks between her legs at the dangling turd and finds something white embedded in her shit.

The turd breaks off, and Sally relieves her urine all over the long turd. She then wipes and gets up, frowning. Before she flushes, she kneels near the toilet, plugging up her nose at the nasty odor and looks once more at the embedded object in her feces.

Her eyes widen and her mouth falls open as she realizes it was a small skeleton. Sally was a smart woman, and after frowning at her poo for a second, she works the whole thing out.

info.brief_description: Adam is shrunk before her party and has to try to survive his unaware Mom and her Friends!
info.description:
You are Adam. You're finishing setting things up for your Mom because she is having friends over for a get-together(party) soon. She is upstairs changing when you suddenly shrink to 1/8th of an inch! Now you have to see how long you can survive before either your Mom or one of her friends kill you in some fashion.


This is an UNAWARE interactive. (If Adam is seen, have him be seen as a small bug or something)
You can kill Adam whenever or almost however you want.


Chapters can be shorter but please no one liner sentences.
No "unbirthing" (whatever that really means).



Adam - You - 18yr old

Sally - Mom - 38yr old
http://www.vh1realityworld.com/files/2008/12/ilm2_cast_milf_6.jpg

Cora - Mom's CoWorker - 35yr old
http://www.nllinsider.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/crystal-titans.jp...

Emily - Mom's Best Friend - 37yr old
http://l.yimg.com/l/tv/us/img/site/18/20/0000041820_20070801145008.jpg

Beth - Neighbor - 33yr old
http://s.bebo.com/app-image/7924863618/5411656627/PROFILE/i.quizzaz.com/img/q/u/...

Tina - Mom's Good Friend from College - 36yr old
http://images.buycostumes.com/mgen/merchandiser/31968.jpg



Again, keep in completely unaware and have fun filling out the plot until he DIES!


I actually enjoy and encourage DEATH!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

(but please try to be descriptive and have details involved)
